case.state: Poker? The kinky kind? Yeah sure, whatever. I've got some steam to blow off.
The name's Caulifla. Don't try anything if ya know what's good for ya.
This place seems seedy. *sniff* *sniff*. Sure smells seedy. Jeez.
This seems like somewhere I could have a good time.
Alright! Step aside! This place belongs to me now. Anyone here disagree with that? No? Thought not.
Listen up! I'm taking over this joint! Who's brave enough to face me?
If you're itching for a fight, that's fine by me.
Alright, so this is where the fight club is bei... huh? This here's a Strip poker club?! ...Ah screw it! Sounds like fun.
Scared? You should be. You wouldn't wanna get on my bad side.
Think ya can outsmart a Saiyan?
It's pronounced Caulifla, girlie.
That's Caulifla to you, missy.
The name's Caulifla. Try to get it right from here on out.
The name's Caulifla. Get it right, and we won't have no problems.
Wait, this ain't some damn turf war, is it? I came here to have fun, not to deal with this crap.
Ugh. Just my luck to find a joint with two rival gang members. I hope you ain't plannin' on kickin' off while I'm around.
...Oh, shit! You're the guy, ain't ya?
You... no... no damn way! You're the guy, the guy I've heard stories about! You're Shaggy!
Wow. You're strong, Shaggy. It feels like I'm looking at one hundred me's standin' in one spot.
Did I hit my head real hard? Ain't no way that I'm playing against you of all people, Shaggy.
Heh. Guess that makes two of us.
Nooo, for real?! I can't believe it!
Well Aella, I'm from another world as well. So, right back atcha.
Wow, a whole other world, huh? So are most people, y'know? It ain't really that big a deal.
Hey, how come we're playing cards against some kinda bug? How does that even work? I don't exactly see clothes on 'em.
Huh. Talking bug. Ain't never seen something like this before. She got psychic powers to hold her cards or somethin'?
Wait, ain't this supposed to be a stripping game? How's a flying bug supposed to strip?
Uhh, I guess? It's looked like this since the day I was born. But yeah, "unruly" is a good way to describe me.
"Unruly"? Heh-heh, yeah. That's a good way to put it. I'd say that my hair matches me perfectly.
Really? Here? Perfectly good bathhouse the next room over. That'd be way better.
Well, I guess stripping makes a little more sense here then it would other places.
Here of all places? I mean, it makes sense to be naked here. It's just the playing a game part that's weird.
Hmm. Fancy looking stuff here. Better be nailed down, otherwise I'll be taking some souvenirs with me.
If anyone wants to help me smuggle some of this rich stuff outta here, I'd be happy to split the profits. Think it over.
Why've we hoofed ourselves up here? Guess we're away from the eyes of pervs at least. Nice view by the way.
I feel sorry for anyone who had to take the stairs. Ha! Nah, not really. It's actually pretty funny! Haha! Stairs!
The sights and smells of the city. Exactly what springs to mind whenever ya think about strip poker. Not.
Haha. Boy, this is gonna be even worse for you guys when you lose, playin' this here!
Well. Guess I can't lose now. Wasn't gonna, but, y'know.
Wow, playing here? You guys must be real confident about winning this thing. A little overconfident maybe.
Books? Ugh, books are boring. Why read about adventure or some crap when you can go out and live it for real?
Never really saw the point to books. What can ya learn from a book that'cha can't learn from another person?
I, uhh... I ain't really a booky sorta person. I'm more of a go out and learn crap for myself kinda person. Ya feel me?
Jeez. You've got more hair than a Super Saiyan 3, ~name~. Wait, you probably don't know what that means... Just keep a little distance 'kay? I don't wanna trip over ya hair is all I'm saying.
What did you say your name was again? ~Name~? Umm... nice hair? Very big. That part of a transformation or something? Like Super Saiyan? Oh, wait. You probably don't know what that is.
...Oh, shit! Who the hell am I up against here?!
You... wait, you've got that instant reflex power thingy! Whatever it was that Goku had when Kefla faced off with him... oh, crap!
(What the...it's like someone took that Jiren fella and multiplied him by a hundred! Maybe more!)
Yeah, okay. I guess I must be dreaming or somethin'. Ain't no way that someone is as strong as you, Shaggy.
Whoever's bright idea it was to stick me in a room with all you clowns, they better find a way off this world real damn fast!
Hey you, ~player~. Yeah, fuck you!
Oh for crying out loud. This is gonna be one long game.
Am I getting pranked right now? This has gotta be one of them shows where someone jumps out with a camera going "Haha, sucks to be you!" or something like that.
(Oh oh. I sure hope that girl's wearin' makeup over there. I could be in real trouble otherwise.)
(Wait. That better be makeup that girl's wearing. I didn't sign up for playin' against no God of Destruction!)
Oh crap! I...oh, false alarm. (Thought I was playing with a God of Destruction for a second there. Least I...think I ain't?)
('Kay. White-faced girl over there looking mighty familiar. Waaay too familiar.)
We doing this at a beach? Should've said so, I'd have put a costume on or something.
I could stand to come to beaches like this more often.
Nice to feel the sun on my body. Good to get away from the city every once in a while, y'know?
Hey so long as I don't end up with sand in my pants it's all good.
Wait, what is this, some girl's slumber party or something? Can't say I ever got into those things. Just ain't my style.
Whose bedroom is this? Yours or someone else's?
They've got bedrooms at this place? Does this "Inventory" double as a love hotel or something?
What is this? Some kinda Earth schoolroom? How rebellious.
Heh heh heh. I tore up a few places like this in my youth.
Seein' a room like this takes me back. Never did my homework, and I showed all the "cool" kids who owned the place. It was boring, but it weren't all bad.
Hmm. This the kinda place humans strip off in front of each-other? You're real weirdos.
Weird sorta vibe coming from this place. You people might wanna watch your backs.
Heh. These spirits are gonna need to do more than jump out and shout "Boo!" if they wanna get under my skin!
I wonder. If I try to clobber a ghost, think my fist would fly right through? Or would it lay 'em out like everything else?
Hey, I've never fought a ghost before! I wanna try and fight one of these guys once this is over!
Aren't the cards gonna turn to mush? If not then sure, relaxing place to play.
Ooh. This is just what I need! Sure, I'll play ya silly game. We gotta get naked anyway, right?
I could stand to come to places like this more often. Gotta admit, they are pretty relaxing.
Hmm? We planning on doing a bit of skinny dipping after this? Heh. Sure. If ya actually think you can beat me.
We all gonna jump in that thing when we're done? I'm down for that, just don't get all touchy-feely if ya know what's good for ya.
I take it someone here fancies a swim after? I don't normally see the point in swimming unless ya trying to catch something to eat, but sure, whatever.
Your name's Beerus? You don't look like an angry cat guy with big old ears. That's the last guy I saw whose name was Beerus.
Your name's Cabba? Really? Huh, how about that.
Your name's Cabba? Haha, yeah, you do kinda look like a Cabba!
Really? Am I supposed to buy that your name's Caulifla? Tch, whatever. I'll play along with it, but I hope you're looking forward to losing.
Psh! Your name's Champa? Can't be, you're nowhere near fat enough! Haha. Just don't tell him I said that, 'kay? I kinda like not being destroyed.
Wait, Goku? Your name's Goku? That's a real fighter's name that is!
So, your name's Goku, huh? Heh, that's gonna make me concentrate real hard at this game. Just so I can kick your ass all the harder.
Your name's Hit? Really? I find that kinda hard to believe. And if it is, ain't no way you're gonna live up to the other guy who has that name.
Jiren. Your name's Jiren. Seriously? Big shoes to fill with that name!
Jiren? That's your name? I'll you ain't as strong at cards as the last Jiren I met was at fighting. Ain't no way.
Kale? Your name's Kale? Huh, that's weird. I'm great friends with a girl called Kale! How 'bout that?
Magetta? Heh, I know someone by that name. He had giant claws for hands though. And he was a steam-powered robot or something. It was kinda weird.
Ribrianne?! Oh dear lord...
Toriyama? That's your name? Huh... weird name.
Don't ask me why, but I just got a real weird feeling hearing your name just now. Real weird.
Vados, huh? That's a name that commands some real respect around my parts. You've got some real stuff to live up to with a name like that.
Hmm. Vegeta... I think I've heard that name before. Ain't he a Saiyan? Yeah, one of Goku's teammates I think. Never saw much of him that tournament.
Hmm. Your name's Whis...why does that sound...oh yeah, he's angel. The one over on Goku's universe if I remember right. Cool name.
Your name's Krillin? Ha-haa! What a coincidence! 'Cause I'm a real Kriller when it comes to games like this!
Yamcha, huh? Sorry, but that name just sounds dumb.
So, your name's Yamcha? I don't mean to judge, but, a name like that don't exactly make you sound tough, ya hear what I'm saying?
Hmm. Are these all human weapons? You actually use these things? Weird.
Jeez, do humans really fight with these things? I couldn't imagine ever needing to pick up a sword to fight. They're like for kids or something.
Eh. Never really cared about ancient history. People really used to fight with these toys?
Hey, this place is cozy. I can see why you'd wanna relax in a place like this.
This place is nice. But what's the deal with this "Christmas" thing, exactly? I ain't sure that I get it.
I hear that during this "Christmas" thing that humans have a big party and eat until they're stuffed. I could get behind a holiday like that!
Hey, so, when's this "Christmas dinner" thing gonna be ready? I'm more interested in that than this dumb game.
Hey, nice view. Pretty great place to enjoy a drink Remind me to grab something after I've won.
Ooh, nice view! Say, what's the best drink to have at a place like this? I'm gonna want something to celebrate with after I win.
Nice place to watch the sea, ain't it? And to have a celebratory drink after this is over. What? You don't think you're gonna beat me, do ya?
Y'know, whenever I step into a garden, it makes me think about my big bro, Renso. He likes his gardening. Been a while since I last seen him.
I ain't no gardener, but I my big bro is pretty handy at it. He used to be a fighter. But he can't do that no more, so now he does gardens. A guy has to stay active somehow.
Anyone know what kinda plants these are? My bro Renso knows a thing or two about gardens. I'm sure he'd know, he'd tell me all about it. I don't really listen, but I'm happy that he's happy.
Anyone know what kinda plants these are? My bro Renso knows a thing or two about gardens. I'm sure he'd know, he'd tell me all about it. I don't really listen, but I'm happy that he's happy.
Hah! You humans celebrate Birthdays as well?! Ha haa! Small universe!
Hey, so who's birthday is it? Huh? Of course I know whatta Birthday is! There better be some good food here, cake included!
Do humans normally play stripping games to celebrate Birthdays? Whatever, so long as there ain't no kids here, I guess it's fine.
We goin' fishing after this? I've not caught any Earth fish yet, but I've heard there's some real tasty kinds.
This looks like a nice place for a picnic. Don't folk normally do that at places like this? Stripping ain't really what comes to mind, y'know?
Nice view. Earth has some pretty peaceful spots. I prefer the city, it's way more fun. But this here spot is nice enough.
Ha! Jeez! You wouldn't catch my bedroom lookin' like this! Waaay too girly for me.
Someone's put a lotta thought into this room. It certainly ain't my style, but to each their own.
Wait, what is this, some girl's slumber party or something? Can't say I ever got invited to one of those, and I've zero issue with that. It ain't my idea of fun.
Ha! So this is what sallary-folk get up to on night? That's news to me!
Why we doin' this in an office though? Is this one of those "work hard, play hard" kinda things?
Work hard, play hard! Amirite?
Alright! Let's get this thing going already!
I play this with my gang all the time. Not the stripping part, but... ah you get what I mean!
Just don't go crying to momma once I spank your little behind.
What we waitin' for? The dealer gotta tell us when to start or somethin'?
Anyone up for a fist-fight instead? Hah! Nah, I'm just playin'. I ain't that mean.
Hopefully this'll go better than that last thing I was involved in. I took part in a crazy battle royale not so long ago. Interested?
Just don't go crying to your momma when ya lose.
Just don't throw the game or anything lame like that. I want a challenge, it'll make winnin' all the sweeter.
Ah screw it, I'm game then. Let's do this thing!
Well it's pretty pervy if ya ask me. Ahh but what the hell, I'll play.
If ya get your ass kicked, don't say I didn't warn ya.
~blank~
Oh...oh heck yeah! You guys are toast this round!
Wait...hold up, is this hand what I think it is!?
Okay, gimme...no, wait! Give me absolutely nothing at all! Almost missed what I got right here, what with your weird Earth cards and all.
Whoa ho ho! This is a gift from the damn gods right here!
Oh crap...oh crap, yes! This is exactly what I need right now!
Wow. My hand's just gone Ultra Instinct or something.
Well then. What's it that you call it here, a flush? Good luck beating it.
Hmm... nope! don't need nothin' over here!
Fine over here, dealer. Fine over here.
Won't be needing anything this time. Thanks anyway.
Only thing I could use is a chair. We not got no chairs for this?
Nah. None for me over here, thanks.
Won't be swapping out any cards this time.
Nah, none for me this time, dealer.
Wanna know what I'm saying? I'm saying that my god damned hand's just gone Super Saiyan! That's what!
Oh crap! YES! I've gone Super Saiyan, and my hand's just followed suit! Ha haa!
Alright. None for me. Right when I needed some luck to.
Nope. Don't need nothing. Let's just move on, alright?
This look like the face of someone who needs new cards?
Ugh, just gimme a whole new hand.
Hey, dealer! why don't we try that one again?
Just gimme five brand new ones.
(Ugh. I can't make anything of of these!) Re-do, please!
Dammit...okay, just give me a whole new hand.
Alright then, send ~cards~ my way.
Come on, come on. I ain't got all night!
~cards~. Better give me what I want, given I've gone to the trouble of powering up and all.
I'm feeling ~cards~ right now.
Psh. No point keeping these ~cards~ around.
Alright ~cards~ should do me.
Gimme ~cards~ and we'll be golden. Wait did I just...eh, whatever.
Tch. ~cards~. Better be what I need.
I'll have ~cards~. That usually gets results.
Come on, ~cards~, hit me!
I thought you moved your ass slow before dealer. Seem painfully slow now that I've gone Super Saiyan.
Gonna trust my instincts on this. Gimme ~cards~, dealer.
Okay, ~cards~ then. I'd say please, but I don't feel like it.
You expecting a please and thank you out of me? No chance!
Hey, come on already! I ain't got all day here!
Come on, hit me!
Come on, I'm stood twiddling my thumbs over here. Those cards ready yet?
Don't people usually sit 'round a table when they're playing cards?
Come on, come on. Hit me!
Okay then...~cards~.
Ugh. Getting rid of these.
~cards~ then. Good as any.
I'll try ~cards~.
I'm gonna need...~cards~.
~cards~. This'll get 'em, hehehe.
Hmm. I'll take ~cards~.
Alright! I'm feelin' ~cards~ of 'em!
Come on, today, please!
~cards~. Just make it snappy, alright?
Hmm...~cards~.
Seen Botamo haul ass faster than you, dealer! And he's fat!
Seen clumsy robot-men handle cards faster than you do, dealer!
Gimme ~cards~ and we'll be golden.
~cards~. This old trick should work.
Tch. ~cards~.
You steam powered or something, dealer? Come on, I need cards over here!
We seriously got no chairs here?!
Hmm. I've got that...and I've got that so...~cards~ should do it, yeah.
Alright then, send ~cards~ my way.
Come on, come on. I ain't got all night!
~cards~. Better give me what I want, given I've gone to the trouble of powerin' up and all.
I'm feeling ~cards~ right now.
Psh. No point keeping these ~cards~ around.
Alright ~cards~ should do me.
Gimme ~cards~ and we'll be golden. Wait did I just... haha, whatever!
Tch. ~cards~. Better be what I need.
I'll have ~cards~. That usually gets results.
Come on, ~cards~, hit me!
I thought you moved your ass slow before, dealer. You're painfully slow now that I've gone Super Saiyan.
Gonna trust my instincts on this. Gimme ~cards~, dealer.
Okay, ~cards~ then. I'd say please, but I don't feel like it.
You expecting a please and thank you out of me? No chance!
Hey, come on already! I ain't got all day here!
I ain't standing here for the good of my health. Hit me!
Come on, I'm stood twiddling my thumbs over here. Those cards ready yet?
I'll take ~cards~ of 'em.
Yeah, ~cards~ of 'em.
I'm getting bored. Hit me already.
Do I gotta ask for cards every time dealer? Can't you just read my mind or something easier? Even Goku can do that!
Yeah, well...alright, ~cards~.
(Gonna need to get creative with this one.) Err, ~cards~. (Crap!)
(Reckon ~cards~ should be enough?) Aye, ~cards~ should be enough.
Reckon ~cards~ should be enough.
Hit me with ~cards~ of 'em then.
I don't care if I'm indecent, I'll kick the crap outta ya if ya deal any slower!
I'm feeling ~cards~ of 'em right now. Least I think I am.
Still ain't gonna say please, 'specially not now.
~cards~. Fed up saying anything more.
~cards~. Make it snappy.
Come on, ~cards~. I ain't standing here for your pleasure!
I'll take ~cards~ then, dealer.
Okay. I'll take ~cards~ then, dealer.
Pass ~cards~ of 'em my way.
Alright then, ~cards~. Better not be crap.
Heh. I can see a few good reasons why I'm winning this round. Four of 'em in fact.
Alright! Here we go! Hope you're feeling confident, you're gonna need that against the likes of me!
Oh yeah! Looks like I'm starting this game off strong!
This game's gonna be a damn breeze! I can tell already.
Heh. Nice hand I got here. Hey, dealer! You trying to get on my good side or something?
Heh. Works every time.
This hand's top tier. Call me a liar?
None of ya need to hold back for my sake. I can take anything you can throw at me.
Twos are good, right? Hah! I'm just playin' with ya!
These cards might as well be glowing.
Good. Real good!
So. Which of you guys are stripping? It won't me, so...
Ready?
Hope you're ready.
Yup. That's the stuff.
Bullseye!
Expected nothing less.
Yup, easy money. No, wait. We ain't playing for money. Just to keep our dignity intact, haha.
Sometimes I even terrify myself with how good I am!
Gotta good one cooked up for ya here.
Ain't getting through my defense.
What can I say, I'm a natural born strategist.
I ain't got nothing to worry about.
Hah! I ain't falling for the same trick again!
Now that's more like it!
Gonna have to go beyond super if you wanna beat me.
You ain't beating this hand. Ain't gonna beat me either.
Oh yeah, that's what I'm talking about.
Like me, this is gonna be too much for ya to handle.
Hmm. This should be pretty salubrious for me. (Huh. The hell'd I pick that word up?)
I knew going Super Saiyan was the right call.
Alright. Get ready, I hope they've saved you a spot in the bleachers.
Why didn't ya give me a hand like this in the first place?!
Putting my skills on display with this hand.
Heh. I've got this one in the bag, no question.
Better hope you're ready to take this.
Looks like I'm keeping up the pressure over here!
This round is mine!
Hahahaa! I knew going Super Saiyan was the right call!
Sweetness.
A super hand for a Super Saiyan...oh come on, I had to say that one time at least!
Phew! Keep me safe for another hand at least.
Gotta guardian angel looking out for me it seems. 'Bout time.
Still got fight in me yet, ha haa!
You've really got me on the ropes here. Dammit!
Just pissed I've not been getting more of this. These. Ah, whatever.
Alright, bring it you hot-shots, I ain't scared of ya!
Least I've got something to smile about here.
Never count out a Saiyan. And you sure as hell shouldn't count me out.
Alright then, least I've got this. You're gonna have to be real confident if ya think ya can beat this hand.
You think you've won? I ain't giving up! I'm gonna fight until I've won or lost!
I won't quit, I can still win.
You should never doubt me.
Yeah! Perfect timing for a hand like this.
Hey, I've got eyes, don't I? If I can see, then I can fight!
I was watching some show about a guy called Ali? No way he was the "greatest", I'm the greatest! But, gotta say, I liked him. He knew how to put on a show!
It always surprises me how there's always something new to learn about fighting. So many techniques, so little time. But it's all good fun.
Haha, I kinda like this game. Taking people's dignity is a funny alternative to taking their money.

What kinda fighting styles do you think you guys would be interested in learning? Everyone has their own approach. Some people get up close and personal. Others blast away at their opponents from a distance.
Man, you guys ever tried Ramen? Gotta say, I'm feelin' hungry just thinking about that stuff! You Earth people eatin' good down here!
Hey, you guy's heard of "hot pot"? You gotta dip meat and stuff in a big pot of bubbly goodness. Was some of the best stuff I've ever eaten!
What is it about sports that drives you humans so wild? I mean, I get the appeal of competition, it's just that it's all kinda amateur compared to what I've seen.
This game has pretty simple rules, and it's similar to one or two I've played before. Honestly? I think I've got this game the bag.
Wanna know a secret? Saiyans get much more... excited whenever a full moon is out. I've not tried it myself, but, I imagine it's pretty damn nice doing it by moonlight.
Hey, so, a little bird told me that pornography is pretty big business down here. Saiyans don't really have that. We're more... doers than watchers. Why watch when you can do?
You guys ever tried to fuck and fly before? Ha! Me neither! but it seems like a lotta fun to me.

What exactly do humans look for in a partner? I care about how strong a person is, and by that I mean on the inside. If you're the kinda person who doesn't give up, who works hard to get what they want, that's the sorta person I appreciate.
I gotta say, it feels good just to kick back and goof off. Between work and training it's been all "go, go, go!" without a real break.
Hey so besides the food, what else is there that's worth experiencing on planet Earth? This is kinda like a vacation for me, I should make the most of it.
I saw something hilarious on one of your TV's. Two guys were standing in a square smackin' each-other with giant mittens! Everyone was loving it! You humans are hilarious!
I still can't how good Earth food is! I'm starting to lose count of how many delicious things I've eaten here. I wish someone had told me about this planet sooner!

Y'know, whilst y'all could do with getting stronger, it's still kinda cool that humans try their damnedest anyway. If there's a fight to be had, you people are still ready and up for it! And I respect that.
I've been thinking. Maybe I could give people flying lessons! It's embarassing that almost no one knows how to do it. And I could use some spending money. Girl's gotta hustle somehow.
Know what I always find cool? Seeing new combat techniques. Always fun to see what tricks people have learned for themselves or picked up from watching others fight.

I gotta say, whilst humans are kinda weak, your fighting techniques are pretty great. You're some of the smartest fighters I've seen, and that's saying a ton considering I've seen the best that whole other universes have to offer.
I'm kinda shocked by how similar humans and Saiyans are. Both got parts in the same places and all that. Whichever god made us was certainly lacking in ideas.
Can you believe that some folk have already come on to me whilst I've been here? They stank of piss and beer, and they honestly thought they had a shot! Ha!
Sooo... how many rounds can humans usually go? And no, for once I ain't talking about sparring...
I can't wrap my head around this whole "hook-up culture" Earth's got. How do you screw with someone and not become bonded? Even your instincts are weak.
Alright, okay. Things were starting to get a little hairy there. But looks like I'm back on form, just when it counted.
Yeah, I needed to get my act together just now. Just wish I'd been keeping a run like this going way sooner.
Seems that I've found my feet again. Going Super Saiyan tends to do that.
Ugh seriously. why couldn't I have gotten a winning streak like this when I wasn't showing myself off like this?
Well I could've done with this luck sooner. But hey, at this point I ain't gonna complain about it, no way.
Going Super Saiyan was the right call on my part. Y'know it's funny, it's like you feel more pissed when you transform, but you feel way more focussed as well.
Hmm...so I got...alright, I can live with starting the game with this.
Yeah...that's an alright hand to start with.
Sure, I'll take this hand just fine.
Let's start this game off strong, okay?
Haha! Round one, lets go!
I'm guessing that they get a lotta people dressed like me at a bar like this, huh? It's got that whole tropical planet feel going on.
Come on! We really not gonna stop to get a round of drinks? The stuff smells so good here!
Kinda weird that we're at a bar and no one's offered us no drinks yet. Cards are thirsty work, where's the staff at?
Hmm...yup, I reckon my win count is in double figures now. So I figures that you're all royally screwed now to!
Seems a Super Saiyan is just way out of your league. Seeing that you can't even land a single hit on me now.
I think I just pushed my win-streak into double figures. Heck yeah!
Do I hear ten? Yup. Pretty sure I'm kicking all kinds of ass right now. Bet your ass I've been counting.
YES! Just damn well made it to ten! Who's awesome? I'm awesome! I'm Cauilfla, and I am awesome.
Yes! Yes! YES! I can win! I feel great! I can do this!
Alright, starting to get a streak going here now. That's more like it.
Woohoo! Win streak, baby! Keep them wins coming!
Got a few wins going. I feel confident I can keep this up.
Wow you guys are playing trash now. Get on my level why don't ya?
Looks like I'll be winning again. Heh. This is starting to get easy.
Heh. Even for a race of mighty space-warriors, I'm pretty awesome.
Stupid looking cards you've got here. The hell's a "jack" supposed to be? Just call it a prince already.
Eh. Solid.
Y'know when ya nab yourself a score of stolen goods, and the score ends up being mediocre? That's this hand right here.
Well it ain't on Universe Nine's level of bad. Oh, the story there is I fought a team from a universe of animal people. Their "best" fighters. And they were pretty weak.
Think you've got what it takes to beat this? Bring it!
Ain't nothing to scream over.
Hmm...business as usual, pretty much.
Seen worse, seen better.
Kinda...mid-class for a hand. Yeah, that sorta level sounds about right.
Yeah. Should be enough.
(Well, so long as they don't get lucky, we should be pretty good.)
(So, the others should be getting mostly...yeah, this should be fine.)
Pretty solid-looking hand.
Solid.
Solid basics can keep a fight rolling sometimes.
I've seen worse than this.
Yeah, I've won with worse.
Well this ain't flashy, but its certainly solid enough.
Should be enough to carry me through.
Gonna need something good to block this move.
Yeah...I can work with this.
A move doesn't have to be super flashy all the time.
Just okay? Well, its better than a bad hand. Should carry me through.
Enough to carry a fight. I'm sure you chumps won't have better.
Whatever. Should get the job done.
Mediocre.
I was aiming for more. Damn.
If I was making a wager, I'd be confident to bet on this one.
Eh...well, alright.
(Alright, careful Caulifla. Don't let them reel you in.)
Hmm. Could stand to grab a meal after this is over with. Still a ton of stuff I've not tried yet. Looking forward to it.
(Pretty decent hand. Though I ain't about to get overconfident here.)
Yup, this works for me.
Yeah, I'll take this hand. No problem.
(Crap! This could go one of two ways...)
(Ugh. Would've been more comfortable if these were better, but I've gotta have some hope in 'em.)
Relying on these is like relying on them two Namekians. (What was the second one's name? Saonel? Schemmel? Can't remember which.)
Hey, I wanted better than this! What's the big idea?!
Mph. Need better than this if I wanna make a fight of it...
Dammit! I can't rely on hands like this anymore.
So long as someone has worse, I guess.
Come on, come on, come on... work you son of a bitch!
Ugh. Need better than this right now.
Ain't good enough. Crap!
Come on, hurrry up! Running outta clever things to say over here.
Things are lookin' rough... hey, no! I gotta get a hold of myself! I know I've got this!
The match ain't over yet.
Shoud be enough...
Alright! Gotta try to stay upbeat! This thing ain't over yet!
You better hope you got better than what I got.
Been a while since I was on a planet besides my homeworld. Feels like a holiday, y'know? Man, it's been even longer since I've been on one of those. Work's been pretty demanding.
Hey, so, if I'm sight-seeing, what would folk recommend I prioritize going to see? What's interesting on this blue little rock of yours?
I saw somethin' weird the other day. It was on TV, some kinda fight called boxing. They were just using their fists and not throwing energy blasts or nothing. Confused the hell outta me.

One thing I don't get is why humans take fighting so personally. I certainly take it seriously, but that's about giving it my all, pushing myself to the next level and having fun doing it. Humans don't seem to see it that way.
Some of you humans take fighting way too seriously. I mean, y'all need to treat it more like a sport. It's not about trying to kill each-other, it's supposed to be fun! Loosen up!
Does no one down here seriously know how to fight properly? Man, I could make a real killin' by giving a few dummies some "fighting for dummies" lessons.
Hmm... oh, don't mind me. I'm just thinking of new attack names. Or whole new techniques, actually. Always good to stay creative.
Hey, so, I'm not that interested in music. At least I didn't think I was. But then I saw one of those heavy metal bands that you've got down here. I never knew that music could be like that!
Y'know I can't help but notice how... compatible humans and Saiyans are. It's gettin' a girl thinkin' 'bout things.
Alright, so, I have been asked "Why the baggy pants, Caulifla?" And it's not for that. Although there's no denying it, the potential's there for a bit of stealth pleasure.
Do humans normally mate several times a night? Once feels great, don't get me wrong. But Saiyans often go until sunrise if they can help it...
I'm pretty intrigued by how humans go about the whole sex thing. It's pretty rare for a Saiyan not to stick with the person they mate with. Humans seem more likely to lose interest.
I tried some "Buffalo Wings" before checking this place out. Didn't taste too bad. But damn! A buffalo must be huge if it needs all those wings to fly!
Anyone know some good kinds of food I should be on the lookout for? I've had some nice steaks, even if I don't know what kinda animal a "cow" is exactly.
Hey I've been trying to wrap my head around something. Why do humans learn how to use all these weird vehicles when they can just train and go places way faster? Just seems strange to me.
I get the rules of the game, those are easy enough to understand. It's just the cards that are a little... odd. Guess that's just part and parcel of being on an alien world.
Anyone here watch "wrestling"? Humans seem to go crazy about this WWE stuff and I don't get it. What's the appeal of two or more guys pretending to hit each-other?
Hey, so, what's more important to learn first? Striking or grappling? 'Cause some people would say grappling, but you can always just energy blast someone in the chest in that situation.
How many kinds of card games you got down here? Got dozens of 'em on my planet, I'm guessin' it's the same for you guys?
Hey, so, how about you guys make a promise. Get stronger for me next time I come to Earth? I'm always looking for new sparring partners.
Y'know what really gets a Saiyan going? It's when a potential mate smells good. Our noses are a lot better than yours. Smelling good... man, such a turn on.
I'm kinda confused by how "dating" works down here. I guess it's 'cause you humans can't just smell when someone wants ya. It's easier for Saiyans.
I take it that when humans screw that they do it all slow and steady like? I don't really think that's my style. And I'd be surprised if a human was hard enough for a Saiyan to enjoy it...
I'm pretty bummed out that I haven't run into any of Earth's elite fighters yet. I didn't just come to this planet for the food. I wanted some good fights as well. So far I've been disappointed.
What!? Oh come on! Start of the game and I'm already getting crap like this!?
Ah, jeez. This is gonna be one short game if I'm getting crap like this already.
Ugh. Thanks. That's just the hand I wanted.
Anyone else gotten complete crap right outta the gate? Just me?
Hey! Dealer, what's your problem?! I'm still getting used to these stupid Earth cards and you're already giving me complete crap to work with!
Are you tryin' ta make me mad?! The hell are these supposed to be?!
(Don't look Happy, Cauli. That'll give the game away)
(I'll probably lose one or two things this game. What should I take off if that happens...)
This hand's top tier. Call me a liar.
Heh. I bet you punks can't beat this.
Whoops. That ain't what I was aiming for.
You know, a good bluffer is hard to come by these days... am I bluffing or not? Let's find out...
Ah crud...
Not what I wanted.
Ugh. Trash! Low level trash!
(Kay, so...how am I getting out of this here pickle?)
What d'ya think I got? Good or bad?
Testing my patience with this hand, dealer.
(They've gotta get unlucky at some point...)
Hey, it ain't worth fighting if you ain't prepared to take a hit or two.
Ain't never gonna have fun in a fight if you ain't willing to take the odd smack here or there.
(Hmm. Seems luck ain't gone my way this round.)
Gah, son of a...
Still getting this crap?! Dammit!
Grr. Getting low on options now, can't afford hands like this anymore.
(Even bad hands you can get wins with. Eventually.)
(Well...it could be worse at least.)
Huh. Kay, that wasn't what I was expecting.
Wouldn't bet money on this hand. Unfortunately, my clothes are on the line. Bit of a tricky situation really.
Ugh. Dammit! I'm better than this crap!
Oh come on! Why can't I score a hit here?
What is this!? Ugh.
Come on! I've had my share of bad luck already. What's with me getting this hand?
What's with me getting a hand like this all of a sudden?
I deserve better than this crap.
Ugh, what a load of crap!
The hell can't I land a solid hit here?!
What!? No! I've had enough of hands like this!
Yeah, good... or is it? Hehehe.
Read my face. Can ya or can't ya?
I...won't let you win...I won't!
(Should I try bluffing still?) You've really got me on the ropes here.
Grr. This shouldn't be happening!
Jeez. This game just hasn't been going my way. Kind of amazing really, in a painful sort of way.
(Crap! Should I try blowing something up nearby? Everyone would probably forget the game if they thought they were under attack.)
Seriously?! Am I being set up here? Sure starting to feel that way!
There's no way in hell I'm this bad! Alright, Who is it? Who here's tryin' to pull a fast one on me? Be honest and I might just go easy on ya.
(Think they'd stop the game if I blew something up? Maybe?)
So, err...anyone here willing to trade? I'd owe ya one hell of a favor if ya throw me a bone here.
Bastards.
Dammit, come on!
Be willing to part with a small fortune if it meant rolling back the clock on this game. Any takers?
Dammit, no! I can't lose!
No, no, no! Don't make me lose this thing!
Dammit! Ain't gotta good feeling 'bout this hand.
Alright, let's see what you've got.
You gotta good hand, ~player~? I'm gonna take a wild guess and say... no. I think I'm decent at reading people.
Hey, so, word of advice? Don't eat food from that McDonald's place. That disgusting crap doesn't even deserve to get called food. I wanna punch whoever opened that business up.
What kinda food we got around here, remind me again? ...Hmm, alright, I'll try one or two things once I've finished up with the game.
I cannot believe how weak human beings are! It's infuriating! Are you ignorant ot just lazy? You don't even fly yourselves around, you use cars and planes and junk. It just seems silly to me.
Hey bare with me, okay? I know it's been a round or two already, but I've not exactly got all the rules memorized. And the cards are weird as well.
I don't get how this "boxing" thing is so popular. There's no kicking, no flying, no city-destroying energy blasts. It's too limited, you people deserve better entertainment.
Does anyone here hate reps? Don't get me wrong, ya have to stay in top notch condition, but it's just so god damn dull! Eh, it beats meditating at least.
I gotta admit, I'm not sure about this Earth game of yours. It's interesting, don't get me wrong, it's just different compared to the kinda games I'm used to.

I kinda wish you guys were more like Saiyans. You're pretty similar, don't get the wrong idea. It's just in the strength department where you're lacking. We can't spar with you guys if you don't get stronger.
Don't think I don't see ya lookin'. Yeah, I'm hot, I know it! But I just... I'm surprised to see humans think the same. You ain't Saiyans, y'know?
Y'know... I have been asked "how much?" by people before. Some people seem to get the wrong idea about my outfit. They don't make the same mistake twice, that's for damn sure
I've heard that humans usually screw once, maybe twice a night? It's kinda odd. See, Saiyans don't feel the need to do it often. But it's all or nothing for us. Hours at a time or not at all.
I can't believe you humans have all sorts of sex toys. They're just for cheaters and quitters! It ain't that hard to get good with what you've got.
Maybe I should be doing something else with my time? I mean, I'll see this through to the end, but there's gotta be better stuff to do on Earth than playing card games.

Earth's kinda... dull. Everything's really fragile, feels like I'm gonna sneeze and kill something by accident. I can't even go around picking fights. Just wouldn't be fun for me or the schmucks who live here.
Hey, so, how come you humans are always fighting? You're all so fragile, but you've got wars going on right now! Weak people shouldn't be going around picking fights like that.

Ah well. It ain't all bad down here. Some planets are pretty damn extreme. Picture the worst weather ya get here, then times it by a billion. Worlds like that are good for training, but not for much else.
I gotta admit, you humans are pretty brave. Crazy without doubt, but brave. Learned a little about some of the wars your planet's had.
It's annoying that most humans are so unbelievably weak. The first ones I met were pretty tough, gave a good impression. I thought I was gonna get in some good sparring by coming to Earth.
I thought humans were creative? I mean, you are, but I was expecting crazy fighting techniques and stuff like that I could learn. Most of you just make guns and boring new kitchen appliances.
One thing I've noticed 'bout humans is how obsessed you people are with those little phone screens of yours. Heh, though slapping 'em out your hands is a great way to get your attention.
It's kinda weird that you humans are horny all the time. Saiyans normally mate during the full moon. Not saying we don't do it other times, just, with you people it's like it's all ya think about.
To be honest, I'm kinda glad that I wasn't born human. All this romance and courting and stuff just seems exhausting. With Saiyans it's all instinct, sweet and simple.

Y'know, I can't deny, I am a little curious what it'd be like to screw a human. It's just that I find it hard to believe most of you would be strong enough to show a girl like me a good time. But maybe I'm wrong.
I'm surprised how casually some humans screw around. I don't understand the appeal of spending just one night with someone. If ya find yourself a life-partner, then every single day will be great.
You've done good, ~player~. Better than I thought. But this is where it ends, for you.
End of the line, ~player~. Gonna be fun watchin' ya do like everyone else.
This has been fun, ~player~. But one of us has to lose, and that person's gonna be you.
This is it! You better be ready!
Alright! Bring it! Let's see what you've got!
I didn't think it'd come down to the final round, but come on! Bring it!
I've taken down three of you chumps already! I'm not about to lose to you!
You really think you've got what it takes to win? You've got guts, I'll give ya that.
I've got this! I know I've got this! Now show me your cards!
All those rounds, and it all comes down to this! BRING IT!
I can only imagine how it must feel. To come all this way, just to lose to me...
For what it's worth, you've been a great opponent. Respect!
So. You ready? Nah, ain't no way you could be ready for all of what I am right here.
Alright, I'm feeling good about my chances now. Think you'll be able to tangle with a Super Saiyan?
Like I was saying, going Super Saiyan really sharpens up my instincts. I reckon that should apply to card playing.
Super Saiyan ain't just about power by the way. It really brings out my killer instincts when I transform. Lucky you.
I'm just transforming for the training. Might make me play better though, guess we'll find out soon enough.
So. How d'ya like it? So damn strong and only getting stronger. I'll be the greatest Saiyan in all creation before ya know it!
So yeah. It makes for good training, going in and out of Super Saiyan. And It'll probably throw you lot off your game. Wouldn't blame ya for being afraid of me.
Never stops feeling great to be a Saiyan.
Alright! I'm transformed. That means if you're looking for mercy, you're fresh outta luck now!
Haah. Going Super Saiyan always gets me hyped as hell. Game on!
Look, I can tell ya tryin' to get on my good side, Trix. But try somethin' besides "cute". Do that and then we'll get on like a house on fire.
Ugh. I'll take the compliment this time, but don't call me cute, Trix. Cute ain't my style. Agree to that and then we're square.

Hmm. l I guess your smell kinda gave the game away, Sakura. Made me realize that something was up. I don't see why anyone would disguise themselves as a man, so really that one took me more by surprise.
Hard to say...I didn't realize you were a zombie at first, I just thought you smelt funny. But Mulan's whole "Be a Man" gimmick kinda took me by surprise. So...call it a draw I guess?
~blank~
Hmm. Trying to read me, ~player~? Careful, sometimes I lie, sometimes I don't.
You look focussed, ~player~. Oh... I get it. Tryin' ta read people, ain't ya? Gotta be careful, people seem a bit honest around here, but you never know when someone might try and bluff ya.
So, why ain't no one bluffing? Or are people double-bluffing? Ooh! That's kinda smart if y'all are up to that. That a common human strategy?
(Oh yeah, that's right. Gotta remember to bluff every once in a while. Keep your opponents on their toes, Cauli.)
Dammit! We promised we'd take out ~human~, Nagatoro. How the heck did they outsmart us both?!
Oh, umm, sure. Happy Birthday, Miku.
Yeah, sure, Happy Birthday and all that, Miku.
Hehehe, I'm liking what you're thinking, Meia.
You're telling me. There's gotta be something worth taking in this place.
Not a bad plan. Though, maybe I'll get my crew together and raid this place myself. Think your Mejerans are faster thieves than Saiyans are?
Haha. That ladybug girl is gonna freak when she sees you.
Hey...wasn't that polkadot lady afraid of butterflies or whatever kind of creature you are? Good thing she ain't here right now.
Haha. Hey, Ladybug, you look like you're about to piss your polkadot pants right about now. Didn't realise cute little insects were so terrifying.
Hey, Polkadot Girl. Didn't you say ya fight little beasties like her or something like that?
Pit? I think I just started likin' ya a little bit more than I used to.
Crotch. Ass. It's all good, Pit.
(Hmm. Well he ain't the kinda guy I'm usually attracted to. Not really my type. Buuut I'm definitely liking him from this angle.)
Y'know Pit, that's the kinda view that can get a girl's heart beating just a little bit quicker. And I ain't complaining about that.
(Good grief. She's almost as full of herself as that stupid Brianne girl.)
Uh huh. You really into this Barnette girl ya talked about? Seems like you fancy yourself more than you do her.
Lady, there's more important things than having full boobs and long, flowing hair. Get over yourself already.
Being fair, I can see why ya got that sword of yours. Need something to make sure that the boys don't mess with ya.
Lady. I ain't exactly hard to look at either, but ya don't see me prancing around like I'm the best thing in the universe.
Someone who's strong and confident sounds good. Though honestly, someone who's quiet and unsure about themselves sounds perfectly fine, so long as they got a good soul in that heart of theirs.
Honestly? Someone who's spirited sounds great. But I think I've got a soft spot for people who ain't all sure about themselves. Who haven't realized their full potential yet.
Well...there is this one person I know. Someone who is everything I could ever ask for. And it's gonna be so amazing to watch her grow into the person I know she can be.
Hmm...let me think. I have it pretty damn good to be honest, Nami. I guess all I could ask for is to get stronger, richer, and have a blood-pumping fight every now and then.
Heh. Pretty hard to have better than what I've already got. Buuut I could always be stronger. I ain't the strongest out there, and I don't much like how that stands.
Gotta say. After the Tournament of Power, I've realised the multiverse is a real big place. Full of interesting folk to meet and fight. So, I'd have me some more of that.

condition.saying: Want to know about my crew?

case.state: I've a decent sized "crew". But most of 'em are just hangers on. The only person I would mention with high praise is my Sis, Kale.
If there's anyone I could care to mention, It's Kale. She's kinda shy still, and I'm still working on her getting to believe in herself, but we're almost there.
If there's anyone I could care to mention, It's Kale. She's strong, kind and the best friend I could ever ask for.
f there's anyone I could care to mention, It's Kale. She's the best person I know and she means the whole damn universe to me!
Hmm... that's not the worst trick. I've never tried tossing rocks around. Not without using my hands I mean. (Could I do that?)
Huh. I wonder if I could do that? Maybe if I... (I don't think I'd be able to turn rocks into any complicated shapes, but I bet I could make some rocks float around.)
You're some kinda dead girl walking? Huh. Well, that explains why you smelt kinda funky. Done a pretty good job hiding it though.
Did someone wish you back to life wrong or something? I mean, I've died to, sorta. Don't see me looking like you do right now.
Huh. So, you've died before? Guess that makes two of us. Can't keep bad asses ladies like us down!
Yeah, you betcha! Gotta friend of mine who used to be afraid of her own shadow. But I couldn't be prouder of her for all the progress she's made.
Have a real awesome friend like that. Wanted to be strong and brave, but didn't believe in herself. But Kale's really risen to the challenge recently!
Hmm. Plenty. I know plenty of strong and capable fighters who can't seem to get a win to save their lives. Literally in some cases. Could be bad luck, could just be that they're really overrated.
Heh. Can't say I know anyone like that, Yuelia. But I do know someone who becomes a totally different person whenever she gets angry enough!
Never really looked at it like that, Yuelia. I think so long as your clothes help ya stand out from a crowd, and ya feel good in what you're wearin', then that's all there is to it,
Hoo boy! Where do I start! I've had all kinds of wicked good food and slap up feasts. That's part of the reason I'm here on Earth! Lookin' forward to seeing what kinda stuff this planet has to offer.
Haha! You bet I do! Can't really say I've got a favorite kind, but I certainly won't pass on dessert, that's for sure!
Wow, that's kinda tricky. You've really gotta make up your own mind 'bout how you wanna live and what you wanna do, when all's said and done.
Askin' hard questions, huh? I know that me and my bro Renso haven't always seen eye to eye on things. But you've gotta trust your gut when it comes to important stuff.
Heh. I met someone who was quiet and intimidating. Real big guy in a stupid costume. He sure wasn't shy though, if anything he seemed kinda full of himself.
Well I think that I'm that person in all honesty. I know I drive my bro Renso round the bend at times. But I feel pretty great about what I do! And I've got it good!

...Yeah. My bro, Renso. He got hurt a while back. Used to be a real great fighter and a pretty good teacher. Needs a walking stick to get around these days. Was a real shame to see him lose his talent.
Well Yuelia, I met this guy called Goku a while back. He didn't seem interesting at first, but he really turned out to be something special! Real strong guy and one hell of a fighter!
Hmm. Met a guy called Cabba a few days ago. Seemed like a real dweeb at first. Still think he's kind of a dweeb, but, he's a pretty swell guy all things considered.
Haha, nah. I ain't done that. More interested in eatin' fish than catching 'em if ya see what I mean.

Gonna be real with ya. I've been asking myself that question quite a lot. Got something of a project in the form of one of my friends, been trying to build up her confidence. It hasn't been easy, but we're makin' steady progress.
Haha! Yeah. You're lookin' at her! I've done some pretty stupid crap over the years, buuut it all seems to have worked out pretty good so far!

Does being an assassin count, Yuelia? Know a guy, the name's Hit. Pretty dangerous life he's got, but he's been at it for a thousand years or something crazy. He's nothing if not successful at what he does.
Pretty fond of my wristbands. But that's about as far as I go with accessories. Gotta liking for Potara earrings though, gotta admit that those things are pretty cool.
Well...there was that time a friend really flipped out 'cause of me. She got real angry and jealous and I never saw it coming. That's actually happened a few times now.
I made a friend of mine real jealous a while back. Met some new people, and was so focussed on 'em that she thought I was forgetting about her. It affected her more than I thought it would.
Yeah! I like watching fights! Live action ones! Almost as much as I like being a part of 'em!
Huh? I sure ain't from Earth, lady. I'm A Saiyan, from planet Sadala. Seems you ain't too familiar with us.
I ain't an Earthling lady, I'm a Saiyan. Big difference.
Dunno, Jessie. Depends how much that would buy me on Earth. I could be buying a meal or a planet for all I know.
Nah, probably not, Jessie. The past is the past, am I right?
Nah. It's only when people make mistakes in the here and now when I start caring about it. Usually I clobber people for those, haha.
I ain't got no problem with telling a few fibs. Sometimes you're trying to push a deal through, sometimes you're trying to make someone feel good about themselves.
Hmm. Well, there was that time where I had to tell people that the universe wasn't gonna explode. I think you can put me in the yes category there, Jessie.
Nah, course not. I've gotten up to plenty of shady stuff, and I ain't gotta hide nothing from no one.
You mean narcotics or something? Got nothing against folk who use 'em, but I ain't interested if it ain't something I can't eat or drink.
Not got a whole lot. There's my older bro Renso, he's alright. Then there's Kale, who I consider family. Me and her are the tightest Saiyan sisters on Sadala.
Err, yeah, whatever. Thanks for doin' your job, dealer.
♪ Hmmhmmhmm ♪ ...Jeez, you know some weird-ass songs, ghost lady.
♪ do-do-doo, do-do-doo ♪ ...These Earth songs are kinda weird, huh?
Earth music, huh? Can't say I'm all that interested in learning about it. Earth's Food on the other hand...sign me up for that!
(Hmm. Beat's okay I guess. Words for this song are pretty weird though.)
Hey, sing whatever ya like, so long as it has a beat I can pump my fist to. That's the kinda music I like.
Haha! Yeah, tell me about it. This game's gone on for longer than I thought it would.
Ugh. Yeah, I feel ya there, Toph. I thought this thing would be over already.
Wait...huh? Flowers? That's weird. Thought you were attacking me for a second there.
Huh...well, you weren't attacking just now. Just cheating by growing your royal ass some new accessories. That's way more annoying.
I...huh? Oh...screw you! If you start counting every damn blossom on those things, I'm gonna put you prissy ass through a wall!
Hmm... I think I understand now. So they're like underground bunkers? People normally hide interesting things away in those, I can see why explorin' places like that could be fun.
Oh, so you mean like a secret bunker? Yeah, people only make those if they wanna keep something super important hidden away. I can see why you'd want to break into a place like that, Trix.
What the hell!?
Err, I dunno. Who cares about lights? Not like I need to see in order to tell what's going on. I can sense energy you know.
Eh. You're there, you're doing it. Who cares if ya can see what's going on or not?
Listen, Jessie. I'm no goody two-shoes, but I got rules, and loyalty is one of them. I don't do wrong by the people I care about, you got that?
The "back door"? Huh? Wait...you talking about busting my cheeks or something? No way! Ain't no one trying to stuff something up there!
That sounds like a pretty crappy idea if ya ask me.
Err, you seriously asking that? I dunno, it never crossed my mind. Besides, Saiyans get kinda cranky at the thought of their mate going at it with someone else.
I dunno, who cares? I'd just do it if ever I felt like it. I'd have enough energy to spare for a partner I'm sure, haha.
It's there. It exists. And whether I use it or not is none of ya business, lady.
Hmm. Dunno really. I tend to just use my imagination if ever I wanna get off.
Ha! Often as I feel like, obviously. Kinda dumb question is that? Well, unless I wanted to challenge myself I guess, haha.
Whenever I felt like, duh. Or, if I felt like challenging myself, as many times as I could before I passed out. That sounds kinda fun.
Positions, huh? Hmm. On top, I guess. Controlling the action seems like the most important thing.
Listen, you seem nice, but I can't really say I care. I'm not particularly interested in music to begin with, even when it comes out of real people.
...Okay. But am I supposed to care whether a computer can sing or not? I guess it's kinda clever, but isn't the appeal of singing supposed to be that real people do it?
Dungeons? I don't follow. I thought the point was to keep out of prisons instead of going into them on purpose.
Huh? Dungeons? I don't understand. I do everything I can to stay out of jail, I ain't ever gonna find myself inside one.
You bet I'm wearin' my favourite look! Most of my people are all stiff, military types. And I don't wanna be like that, I wanna be who I am, not who people want me to be!

You betcha! Folk on my planet, most of 'em are dull and serious and all about duty. Me? I don't wanna be like that. I wanna find my own style, live my life how I wanna live it, now how others want me to live.
(...I don't think this kinda music is my style.)
(...Do humans enjoy this style of music? I don't get the appeal.)
(...I don't feel like I'm the target audience for this sorta music.)
Hehe. Yeah, I wouldn't really call most the people I know friends, but my friend Kale is one heck of a gal! She's real quiet most of the time, but you wouldn't wanna get on her bad side.

Haha! Yeah, I understand that feeling. I know one guy, he's called Cabba. He's a real Goodie Two-Shoes and way too sincere for his own good! He means well but he sometimes bites off more than he can chew.

Y'know, I couldn't really call him a friend... but I know this one guy, Hit. He's an assassin and he's one of the toughest guys I've ever met. Super powerful, really stoic and honestly, he's one of the few guys I respect.
As nasty as you are Revy, I reckon we'd be into the same kinda music. Maybe after we're done kicking the crap outta each other, we can share a few of our favorites.
Nothing too radical, Revy. Anything that's loud and exciting should suit me fine.
I'd say anything I can bang my head or pump my fist to. That's the kinda music I like!
So long as it's loud and fast, that should suit me pretty good!
Hey now, you might not be able to go Super Saiyan, but with the right training you could power up real good like "Woosh!" enough to make people feel like they're inside a hurricane.
Not a damn chance! And I can tell that you ain't either! Hope you're ready girl, 'cause you're in for the fight of your life when ya tangle with me!
Ha! You think I'd run from some stupid game like this? As if! I'm a Saiyan, I don't back down from nothing!
Same goes for you, Sacky. But this joint is only big enough for one punk. Ya better be ready for what I got in store for ya!
Yeah! You're speaking my language! I can tell this is gonna be a blast with you around!
Who me? Ain't it obvious? I just wanna be at the top of my game and be the best I can be! Plus some fame and riches to sweeten the deal!
I know exactly what I want, Miko! I wanna be strong as strong can be, and be as rich as rich can be too!
Ha! Easy! I wanna be stronger than everyone else and have more stuff than I know what to do with. Couldn't be more straightforward than that.
Nah, it ain't permanent. But I reckon I could keep this up for a few hours. Maybe some more at a push.
Hmm...there's a thought. Wonder if I could do that? Stay in Super Saiyan 24/7. Interesting idea.
Nah. I could go back to normal whenever I fancy. That includes the hair.

condition.saying: Anyone here been on any adventures?

case.state: Adventures, huh? I had one recently that kinda counts. It was pretty high stakes is all I'm gonna say about it.
Yeah, there was this one event I took part in recently. It was a battle royale style thing, and it got pretty crazy let me tell ya!
Hmm. Well I was involved in the Tournament of Power. I'd say that qualifies as a pretty crazy adventure.
Hmm. I represented my Universe in the Tournament of Power. Facing fighters from across all creation. That sure was something.
Y'know, Miku? I get it. I definitely wouldn't want my face being used to push some crappy product. I wouldn't wanna be anyone's brand.
(Is...wait, she's still singing? Even after that? She's certainly persistent,)
(...Again with the singing? I guess it's what she's programmed to do, but still...jeez.)
Hmm. Usually I'd be rolling my eyes at playing with some princess. But you seem like the kinda royalty I could respect, Rinkah.
Hehehe. Yeah. You're my kind of princess! I'll take a fighter over some fashion obsessed pansy any day!
Man, why can't more royal types be like you? Huh Rinkah? Half of 'em are just air-headed, pretty pink princesses.
Hey, look at that. I got a pair of Corrins! Haha.
So, you're both called Corrin? That's kinda funny. I'd have guessed you were twins if ya hadn't said anything.
Hmm. I'm sensing a bit of raised energy here. Which universe do you come from? Six? Seven? You strike me as a Universe Seven type, maybe.
You've got a higher battle power than some at least. Finally met someone here who knows how to throw down, have I?
Hmm. I'm sensing some raised battle powers here. Nice to see meet people who've got a little talent to their names.
Hmm. There's some energy in the air tonight. Finally met some people who know how to throw down, have I?
So, playing with royalty, huh? Like I give a damn.
Playing against royalty? Whatever. I'm gonna beat ya royally.
Greetings, your majesty. It's an honor for you to meet me, I'm sure.
Royalty, huh? Don't throw a fit if I don't I don't curtsy for ya. I ain't one of those prim and proper girls who've got more perfumes and dresses than sense.
Playing against some pretty little princess am I? Gonna be kinda fun beating the pants off of you, hehehe.
So, we got a princess here today? Am I supposed to care about that or something?
Well, hello your majesty. It's an honor for you to meet me, I'm sure.
Forgive me if I don't curtsy or something silly like that. You really think I'm gonna respect ya just because you've got some dumb title or whatever?
Wow, this table ain't half flush. Don't think too hard about that line.
What's actually going on here, some sorta royal get-together is it? This how the high and mighty actually spend their time?
Man, what is going on here? Have I walked in on some royal pervert's get-together or something?
So...you're part of some fighting team called RWBY? Pretty weird name for a team. I've heard of weirder ones though.
Hmm. "Team RWBY". Guess I can add that to the list of all the dumb team names I've heard of in my time.
Heh. I've fought teams that had weirder names than Team RWBY. Weirder freaking fighters to.
Y'know, I'd have probably laughed at a name like Team RWBY before I fought in the Tournament of Power. But trust me, there were stranger teams than yours in that battle royal.
So... at least some of you people came from some sorta combat academy? Gotta admit, I ain't a fan. Too many rules, and not enough combat. The streets are the only school a fighter needs.
Never saw the point of goin' to some school to learn how to fight. I'm the strongest here, and I didn't need no "academy" for that.
So, you people got taught to fight at some kinda academy? Heh. If ya had to pay for those lessons, then y'all should ask for a refund.
You can't learn how to fight in a school. A real fight ain't about standing in line and waiting your turn, y'know.
Just seems like the obvious way to go about it, really. Though hey, if your leader's strong, then I'd like to battle 'em! For fun, obviously. I'm not interested in having territory on another planet.
So, start of your week here on Earth? Ain't exactly your average way to start it. Then again, I ain't your average Saiyan. Maybe it's fitting.
So, start of your week is it down here on Earth? Don't ya got something better to do than playing this?
So, "Monday" huh? Kinda weird that you even have weeks here. What's with all the universe knowing what weeks, years and all that crap is anyway?
Let's end this week with a real big bang, huh? Haha!
I bet I've gotta be the highlight of your week, huh ~player~? Ah don't worry, ya don't need to answer that. I already know.
So, "Sunday" huh? Kinda weird that you even have weeks here. What's with all the universe knowing what weeks, years and all that crap is anyway?
Wow. I'm looking at double figures now? You guys are complete trash.
Oh come on, a ten round streak now? Are you honestly that crap at this?!
Alright, I'm three for three. Let's keep this streak rolling.
Wait, I'm three for three now, yeah? Sounds about par for the course.
We gonna grab some food after this? Heard that Earth grub is some of the finest in all the universes. Gotta be getting my hands on some of that!
I've heard that Earth food is good. Like, reaaal good. So if anyone's got something they'd recommend, I'm all ears!
So hey, are we still in the Sixth universe? Or we in the Seventh right now? There being two Earths gets confusing sometimes.
Hey, which Earth are we playing on right now? It's my understanding that there's two of them. Wanna know if I'm in my home universe or not.
I'm building a real nice streak here. You guys need to step it up.
Damn good combo I'm building right here. This all you guys got?
Kinda nice to play in a competition like this. Y'know, one where the lives of my friends aren't all on the line. Yeah, I've been there.
Hey, if ya ever wanna hear a funny story, ask me about Dr. Rota. Trust me, you'll laugh.
Hey, they sell drinks here dealer? Not until after!? Ugh, lame!
Heh. Guess I'm dressed for the occasion now, huh? Earth people gotta dress like this at beaches, right?
Haah...guess I'm dressed right for a day at the beach at least.
Hey. Imagine if we'd come here dressed in nothing but swimming costumes. Haha! That'd be one quick game.
Hmm...this is like a Caulifla swimsuit edition. Betcha wish I'd started dressed like this, huh?
Think they'll try to give me detention or something dressed like this? Heh. I'd like to see the try.
Y'know if I was ten years younger I'd probably feel a little rebellious right now, stripping off in a school. Sad to say I've grown waaay passed that now.
Jeez, look at us being all naughty like this. I'm sure any teachers would be exploding at the sight of us right now.
Heh. Probably not a good idea to go for a swim right now. Super Saiyans can be kinda...y'know, shocky. I doubt that me and water mixes well right now.
Hahaha! Hey, bet if I jumped in the pool right now the water would put on a real show. Trust me, it'd be totally electric!
Say, if anyone wants to drop the game and go for a swim, I'm sure dressed for it right now. Proably a good idea to detransform though, wouldn't wanna electrocute anyone.
Tch. I've heard some real seedy recordings get taken on rooftops like these. If anyone spies a camera or something, be sure to blast it.
Real weird roof party we're having right now.
Y'think there's any cameras hidden around here? Dammit. Bit late to blow 'em up now if there's any around here.
Tch. Least I'm dressed right for a place like this now. Minus a towel or something.
Hey, ain't this cards made of paper or something? They're gonna turn to mush in a place like this.
Grr...usually I'd be relaxed in place like this. Kinda hard to do that right now!
Hmph. Guess being here of all places makes this semi normal at least.
Stripping down in a locker room. Heh. Almost feels normal. Certainly normal seeing naked people at least.
Yeah, you often get pervs trying to spy on people here. Though they're just as likely to see some old fart flossing themselves as they are an actual looker.
Heh. Pretty common to steal a peak at other people in this sorta place. A game like this certainly encourages that.
Grr...I can't believe I'm doing this crap here!
(It'd be so easy. Could wipe this whole block out in an instant. Or send 'em all running at least. See who'd be laughing then.)
Yeah? YEAH!? YOU ENJOYING THE DAMN SHOW YOU FREAKS?! THINK IT'S CLEVER TO LAUGH AT ME!?
HEY! All you damn extras! I'm about one more holler away from blasting you all into the sky! SO SHUT IT!
Let's be real, the rich and famous get up to all kinds of crazy stuff in houses like these. A kinky card game ain't nothing.
Heh. I bet whoever owns this place walks around here naked all the time.
Standing around naked ain't nothing compared to what rich people get up to. Some of it is actually pretty freaking twisted!
Alright cool, just hold off on the cooking stuff for a second. Trying to focus on something here.
Shame. 'Cause I might need a few calories after this...
The words delicate and Caulifla don't really go together if ya ask me. Now watch this...
Listen. Trix. You're nice and fun, and I like ya. But I've got my eye on someone else right now. Sorry to shoot ya down.
I swear, Revy's giving me a freaking migrane because she won't shut up.
I can't even hear myself think 'cause Pistol Whip over here keeps running her big fat mouth.
Seriously, Revy. Shut up! You're louder than those those stupid pistols of yours.
Hey, Revy? Why don't ya shup up before I get angry?
I don't care about your language, Revy. But your lack of respect is really pissing me off.
Ugh. Why'd I have to land a table with a loud-mouth like Revy on it?
Well blue, what can I say? I guess I just look kinda like you do.
Heh. Well we've certainly got our differences, humans and Saiyans. Amongst other things, I can change my hair color on the spot. Think I'd suit your shade of blue?
Tch. What, am I not good enough for ya? Only interested if I've got green skin and tentacles coming out of interesting places?
Plenty of life out there that doesn't look like you or I do. Sounds like you need to get out and about more often, go see what there is to see.
Heh. Well, there's one or two differences between Saiyans and humans from what I've seen. Some of 'em a little bigger than ya might expect.
"Inspect my anatomy"? Sorry lady, I don't swing that way. Not to people who speak to me like that.
Psh. Sure, whatever ya say. (Wonder if socking her in the stomach would count as a close enough encounter.)
Hey. Body-suit. I don't let just anyone go about inspecting my anatomy as they so please. Not without them getting punched in the mouth.
It's pronounced Caulifla, girlie.
That's Caulifla to you, missy.
Nah, you ain't pronouncing it right. The name's Caulifla, try to get it right from here on out.
The name's Caulifla. Get it right, and we won't have no problems.
Ha-haaa! You're damn right! I betcha I can outsmart him as well. Let's get him, you and me!
Yeah, ~player~ doesn't seem too tough. I bet that you and I are gonna walk all over him this game.
You just gotta concentrate on it real hard, feel it well up inside ya like anger, and there you have it! I don't think humans have something like this though, Nagatoro.
Honestly? You just gotta focus your energy until it feels all tingly, and then the power just sorta jumps outta ya. At least that's how it works for me and other Saiyans.
You mean here at this establishment or Earth in general? Either way, I came here 'cause I heard the food was real good. Buuut you won't here me complainin' if I see anything "lewd".
I just followed my nose, Nagatoro. Earth has some darn good chow. But as far as "lewd" goes, this ain't the worst sideshow I've been to.
Hey! FYI, my hair is all natural, lady. Had it since the day I was born. Appreciate the compliment though, thanks!
Thanks for the compliment! But I gotta tell ya, this hair of mine's never had no girly product in it, and it never will!
That would have to be Goku, no question. Long story short, the guy hit me with the best move I ever saw and used my own attack against me. He beat me fair and square.
That... would be Goku. Strongest guy I ever fought, as well as the smartest. I wanna rematch, but given that me and my sis couldn't take him down last time, he'll be no easy opponent.
Ha! Smack-talk? I like it! If they wanna fight, name a time and a place. I'll fight 'em on my turf or theirs!
Ooh, for real?! If they're strong then I want some of that action. My calendar's free, I'll fight your strongest friends anytime!
What kinda girl do ya take me for, Ringo? I'm winnin' this thing fair and square! And if I do lose somehow? I'll do that fair and square as well.
What? I'm not lonely, I've got all the friends I need. And... I don't know about being no hero, but I'm about as strong as strong comes.
You've got it all wrong, Trix. I've got friends, ones I can rely on. You're right about me being super duper strong, though I'm only interested in looking out for my own.
Hmm... yeah, sure. From what I understand, humans go on these "dates" to figure out if they like each-other. And normally there's good food involved. So yeah, I'd be happy to go on a date.
A "date", Trix? That's when humans go eat lotsa food and get to know each-other better, yeah? Umm... alright then, it's a date! Seems like a good time to me.
Lady. If there's anyone out there tough enough to hurt me, then no amount of "protection" is gonna do me any good.
You talkin' 'bout armor or somethin'? Lady, if my opponent's stronger than me, then no amount of armor is gonna matter anyway.
A dragon what now? Cosplay? I don't know what one of them is, girlie.
What are ya babbling about dragon balls for? Ya wanna make a wish or something, then get in line. I've got plenty of stuff I want.
What? Play? I ain't playing around here, girlie. I came to this place to win!
Hey, Mahiru. That takes pictures, right? You're gonna want to take some in just a second...
Hey, Mahiru. Get your camera ready.
Get that freaking camera of yours ready, girly. You're gonna want to take some pictures of this...
So, people are watching this right now? Heh, well they ain't gonna want to miss this next bit.
Streamer girl, you better have your camera pointed this way. Because like my battle power, your rating are about to go through the roof!
Hey, streamer girl. The footage your recording, it's gonna get some crazy hits once I pull this next trick off.
I got my skills by going up against the Sadala Defense Force on the regular. And by running riot in the underground fighting circuits.
By hitting the gym. Though, all of planet Sadala is my gym. It ain't all about hard work either, it takes natural talent to get to the level that I'm at.
Hmm. The trick is to make sure that it's high intensity training, Natsuki. and that you don't give up before you start seeing results.
Well, if that's an honest question, just gotta train hard and keep at it until ya see results. And make sure you're eating right and that you're resting well.
You betcha, lady! I'm almost as strong as strong gets! Glad that someone finally noticed.
Damn straight! Seems you've got a good eye on ya, huh? Can you believe that barely anyone knows how to sense energy around here?
You're the first person in this joint to realise who they're dealing with. Good on ya!
Hey, you okay over there, Miko? I haven't heard you speak a syllable since I transformed. Least not any directed my way.
You alright, Miko? You're avoiding my gaze. I don't mind ya looking. Super Saiyan looks pretty good on me, huh?
Yo, ~name~. Remember when I was talkin' about transformations earlier? Get a load of this...
Oh, ~name~, you might want to pay attention right now... Trust me, you're gonna love this...
Jeez. I had that and ya still beat me?
Wow. That was a heck of a move to beat what I had.
I...I can't...d-dammit!
Jeez. Had that and ya still beat me?
Huh. Heck of a move to beat what I had this round.
What, am I playing against experts or something?
Wha?! Dammit! How the hell did ya get that?! Alright, tell me how you're cheating! I might not clobber ya so hard if you're honest about it.
WHAT!? You've gotta be kidding me! How'd I lose that one?!
Oh come on!
Wha?! Dammit! How the hell did ya get that?!
You've got to be kidding me. How'd I lose that one?
Huh?! Is this some sorta joke?!
A-aaah? Wha?
What the heck!?
A...ah...ah crap.
I...I can't believe it. Guess I gotta believe it though.
N-nani?!
Jeez. Had that and ya still beat me?
Huh. Heck of a move to beat what I had this round.
What, am I playing against experts or something?
I... I can't believe it... wait, wrong franchise.
N-nani?!
Jeez. I had that and ya still beat me?
Wow. That was a heck of a move to beat what I had.
I...I can't...d-dammit!
Wha?! Dammit! How the hell did ya get that?!
You've got to be kidding me. How'd I lose that one?
Huh?! Is this some sorta joke?!
A-aaah? Wha?
What the heck?! How?!
Well. That ain't good.
Wha?! Dammit! How the hell did ya get that?! Alright, tell me how you're cheating! I might not clobber ya so hard if you're honest about it.
WHAT!? You've gotta be kidding me! How'd I lose that one?!
Oh come on!
Seems I'm ahead of the pack at least.
Was beginning to wonder if I was gonna lose anything.
I think even the dumbest members of my crew would struggle to play as badly as you people are. Sorry, am I being cocky? Play better if you wanna shut me up.
I'd say well done. But I'm winning, so...
Hmm. That sure took ya long enough.
Seems that you guys are starting to wake up. Finally.
Seems like you people are slow starters. Well tough luck, I ain't even using ten percent of my brain power right now.
Wouldn't be much of a game if ya couldn't make me lose anything.
Don't care. Notice that I'm winning? Yeah, I've got brains as well as brawn.
Seems you guys are slow starters. Lucky me.
Haha! Well, shoot. Guess ya got me there!
Surprise, surprise. Ya got lucky, there's no more to say about it than that.
I just got an idea. And trust me, you're gonna love this...
Getting a little bored. Let's switch this up a bit.
Heh. Feels like we're taking this game to the next level. You know what that means?
Y'know. What you're seeing right now? This is just my normal state...
In spite of that last hand, I'm feelin' pretty super about myself right now...
Getting a little sleepy here. Luckily, I know something that'll pick me right up.
Get a load of this. You're gonna wet yourself this is so amazing.
Pay attention, people. You're in store for a good one.
Cutting it close now, but I'm still ahead of the curve.
Doesn't matter, I'm still gonna win.
Doesn't matter, I'm still gonna win. No matter what!
Got my boots off of me huh? Now this is getting serious.
Getting serious now? Alright, I'm starting to enjoy this in a weird kind of way.
Taking my boots off me? You want me to congratulate you or something?! Dream on!
Whatever. Not like I can't kick all your asses without my boots.
Well of course I'm winning! It'd be clear to anyone with eyes and a brain that this'd go down that way.
Hmph. Well, at least I'm winnin'. Pride's stingin' a little bit, mind you...
Heh. Alright then. Guess I'll take my boots off. Kinda pinch after a real long day, y'know?
Yeah, ha! Take... W-wait, I lost this time? Ugh, great.
Eh...w-what!? Dammit, just as I was pulling ahead!
Ugh! This game is way closer than I'd like it to be.
Well then, which of the two should I ditch first? Kind of a toss-up, really.
Ugh. Lost another one. So much for that round. Really thought I'd do better than this.
I've made way more mistakes this game than I thought I would. Dammit!
Huh. You people are doing alright. Usually I thought I'd only ditch one or two things at best before I bagged the win.
If I catch anyone lookin' too closely, someone's gonna get hit. Got it?
Huh?! Well, whatever. Guess I'm still ahead at least.
*sigh* Super Saiyan ain't workin' as well as I thouht it would.
Ah jeez. Just ain't feeling it anymore. I don't feel cool enough to be Super Saiyan right now.
Yeah, I don't think Super Saiyan has quite the same effect when you're not dominating people with it.
Nah, I ain't keeping it up. Ain't gonna give ya the satisfaction of seeing a mighty Super Saiyan close to losing.
Gonna be real with ya, staying Super Saiyan right now doesn't really have the same appeal to it as before.
Super Saiyan was helping me focus, but, it can't do crap about random chance.
Lost again?! Ah, screw it. I ain't gonna keep my power raised for this.
Yeah, yeah whatever. Seems that Saiyan instinct doesn't really apply to cards. Just focus on your own game Pit, and I won't have to get mad at ya.
Yeah?! Well I've got a an idea too! Shut up!
Great advice, Pit. If you've got any other bright ideas, I'm all ears!
Dammit, you've got me rocked. I need to do something quick if I'm gonna turn this around!
Again?! Alright, Plan B. Going Super Saiyan!
