(Crap! Again?! If I don't up my game here I could be in serious trouble!)
Agh, crap! Again!? That's twice now, what the hell!?
No damn way I've lost two whole rounds back to back. The hell's going on here?
Wait, ain't that twice? That's twice now back to back?! Dammit!
Hey! Stop winning, you bastards!

state.text: Gah! Son of a bitch! Why am I getting my ass handed to me all of a sudden!?
Okay...three...that's three freaking times. Hot damn!

case.state: You bastards...
Ah, crap. Again!?
No damn way I've lost two rounds back to back. The hell's going on here?
Wait, ain't that twice? That's twice now back to back?! Dammit.

state.text: Gah! Son of a bitch! Why am I getting my ass handed to me!?
Okay...three...that's three freaking times. Hot damn!

case.state: You bastards!
My turn, huh? Am I supposed to care?
My turn? Whatever.
Fair is fair, I guess.
Good. I don't want you people to be complete pushovers.
So you've got a little talent, huh? That just makes this more fun.
Damn. Ya got me. There goes my perfect game.
Got me, huh? Don't go getting used to it.
Ah well, it ain't exactly the end of all creation to lose a hand.
Don't get cocky. This ain't gonna become a trend.
Well you might not be strong, far as I can tell. But it's brains what matters in a game like this.
No biggie. I've still got ground to give.
Finally got a punch in? Good, I was starting to get bored.
Seems we're pretty evenly matched, some of us. So, I think its time to take things up a level.
Pretty even game we've got ourselves here. But I know just how to up the ante...
Seems like we're on a level playing field pretty much. But I reckon I know a way to shake things up.
Hmm, seems like you're capable of keeping up with me. No way you'll be able to keep up with this though...
(Was meaning to get a bit of training in after this is over. Nothing to say I can't do that right now though.)
(This lot ain't slouches at this. Though, I've got just the thing that'll throw them off their game.)
Hmm. I reckon I could get a bit of training in right now. Don't let it be said that I can't multitask.
Okay...let's try this...
We're neck and neck. I'm actually sorta happy that you lot aren't a bunch of pushovers.
You're making me work for this. Not entirely sure how to feel about that.
Well I've gotta hand it to ya. It ain't every day I find myself being pushed.
Give ya credit where its due at least. You're giving as good as I can give.
I'm surprised how well you're doing. You're smarter than you look.
Ugh. Don't like this, I don't wanna lose.
Getting tired of this. I should be winning by now.
Haha, I lost. Get over it people.
Again? Say what now? You sure ain't making this easy.
Again?! Fine, whatever.
Alright. Make no mistake, I got ya right where I want ya.
Ugh. Should've known it'd come to this, given how closely matched we are.
Hell. I wanted a fight of this...but I wasn't expecting to be pushed this far.
You've gotta be kidding me! Was expecting you to crumble under pressure at this point. Not me!
Of all the rotten crap!
Just when I needed my cards to pull through, they fail me. Perfect.
Wow, this game is tight. Gotta hand it to you people.
This is real neck and neck. I wasn't expecting it.
I don't give a crap about stripping. It's j-just losing that's embarrassing.
Ah jeez. There goes my pride. How do I keep losing?
Yeah, I don't think Super Saiyan has quite the same effect when everyone isn't scared of you.
Nah, I ain't keeping it up. Ain't gonna give ya the satisfaction of seeing a mighty Super Saiyan lose.
Gonna be real with ya, staying Super Saiyan right now doesn't really have much appeal to it.
I can't believe I keep losing rounds! I thought I was better than that!
Screw it. I ain't gonna keep my power raised for this.
Huh, got my work cut out for me already? Good. I like a challenge.
Dressed up all prudish and fancy? Just means that I gotta give it my all.
Hmph. Well that sucks.
Whatever, this doesn't mean anything.
Doesn't matter. Still gonna win and you know it!
Wait... am I losing? No way am I letting it stay that way!
How much are you all wearing... oh, I see. You're gonna make me work for this here victory then.
Games like this can turn in an instant, just like they can in a fight. Don't get cocky!
Damn.
Hey, remember I'm playing with Earth cards here. They're weird-looking compared to what I got back home.
Alright, alright. Playing with Earth cards here, gotta give me a chance to figure them out.
Tch. What a pain.
Getting a little antsy. And I know just what to do about it.
You might be a few hands ahead of me. But I've still got an ace yet to play...
Losing? Not a chance. Time for me to show you lot how it's done.
Alright, I've been going easy on you lot until now. But I'm about to change all that...
(Ain't liking that I'm losing at this point. I've gotta do something, before this game runs away from me.)
Hey, wanna see something cool?
I wonder if...yeah, it might make me play better. Give me a sec, you guys.
You're in for a good one now...
Man. This is just like the tournament. Only it's my stuff that's getting erased instead of other universes.
This is starting to get ugly.
Okay, guess I'm starting to know how my underlings feel. Used to breezing my way through things, normally.
Dammit! Just...dammit!
(Starting to run out of options. I'll be in trouble if this keeps up.)
Crap!
Dammit! I'm the one who's supposed to be laughing at your expense here. The hell's going on?!
Having your back to the wall in a fight is exhilarating. Game like this though, not so much.
Well, shit. Not going my way, is it?
Dammit!
No! I thought I'd at least have that one!
Y'know, whilst I'm pissed about getting myself into a bind, I am still kinda enjoying the challenge of it.
Never knew that Super Saiyans are complete crap at card games. Perfect time to find that out.
What a rosy position to find myself in. Losing, and forced to show my tits off in front of everyone else. (Not like I care about that, just losing that's embarrassing.)
I wanted a decent fight of this but... damn, be careful what you wish for.
You're really kicking my ass. Never expected things to get this bad for me.
What is this, you guys using some fancy tricks to get the better of me?
Apparently I'm worse at this than I thought. Or that the crew I run with are bunch of complete morons.
Ugh, dammit! I know I can stilll make this comeback!
Agh, jeez! What the hell!?
Dammit, I know I'm losing! Just shut your pie-hole already!
What?! My turn? There's no way that can be right!
*sigh* I ain't gonna do it. I ain't keeping Super Saiyan up, not when I'm about to drop my undies in front of everyone.
I should never have let this happen. Shouldn't have let this go so far.
Yeah, I don't think Super Saiyan has quite the same effect when everyone can see your lady parts.
Nah, I ain't keeping it up. Ain't gonna give ya the satisfaction of seeing a mighty Super Saiyan stark naked.
Gonna be real with ya, staying Super Saiyan right now doesn't really have much appeal to it.
Showing my tits off was one thing. This is is worse. Way worse.
Screw it. I ain't gonna keep my power raised for this.
Hmm? Oh, you're talking about Earth food? Alright, now you've got my attention.
Oh I see, so there's some kinda Earth food that sounds a lot like my name. Might just be interested in trying whatever it is.
Ooh, is that right? I wouldn't mind getting me some of this Earth cooking of yours.
(Alright. This has gone on long enough. Time to show her who she's dealing with...)
Can't wait to see the look on your face in five seconds, Revy...
(What am I holding back for? 'Bout time I showed her what I can do.)
(I've got half a mind to knock her block off. But why don't I just scare her a little? Yeah, that sounds like a plan.)
Aright, screw it! I ain't just gonna stand around here getting put on blast by some Earth woman. Time to show ya who's boss!
I've had it with ya! Loud-mouth Earthling thinks she's tough stuff, I'll show ya tough!
You'd be an idiot to think that this is just a pretty light show. It's basically a massive power-up. With Super Saiyan on I bet I could take down a dozen of me without even breaking a sweat.
Hmph. Sure, whatever. Just try and think about how lines sound like that sound before ya go ahead and say it.
Well what were ya expecting? Talking about inspecting someone else's body, you're gonna go giving people the wrong idea.
You and these Mejerans seem like a curious people. Seems to be getting ya into plenty of trouble if ya ask me.

condition.saying: you would do well to be more polite

case.state: Oh please. You think I came to a place like this to make new friends? Get real, lady.
Oh lighten up, tight-ass. I just came here to have some fun. Something that you seem to be having issues with.
Most Saiyans like to think of themselves as galactic peace-keepers. The whole thing's kinda lame, but that's the way it is.
Heh. Well Saiyans certainly like to fight. But most don't start nothing unless someone else starts it first.
What, getting annoyed when a perfect stranger asks if they can get a good look at your "anatomy"? I'd bet that's a pretty universal trait.
It's a trait of mine, lady. I can say that with confidence.
No, no! Don't get the wrong idea, my hair still moves, no different from anyone else's. It just also happens to be virtually indestructible.
Nami, if I can fly and they can't, then that's a hell of a disadvantage for them. I can just rain down fire on them and they can't reach me.
Can't ya see how useful flying is? It's like having the high ground on someone. You can control the action if you're right on top of 'em.
Yup! I'm a Sadalan gal, born and raised! And one of the best fighters my universe has to brag about.
You betcha! Dunno why you're talking about vegetables though, Saiyan names don't sound anything like that.
Saiyan as the day I was born! And I wouldn't have it any other way.
Lady, I don't know what either of those things are, but there ain't no fruit out there that'll give ya hair as fine as mine!
The hell's a hedgehog? And should I be chill or pissed that you're comparing me to one of these things?
Devil's fruit, huh? Don't know about those, lady. But if they're tasty, I wouldn't mind trying one. Been meaning to get me some of that Earth food I've heard so much about.
Nah, that ain't true at all. Some of 'em are dumb, jacked ladies as well. 'Cept for me of course, ya don't get to where I'm at by being a dummy.
Ha! That's funny. Yeah, some of 'em are pretty dull. There's some brainy Saiyans though. Generals. Scientists. Those kinds of people.
Not everyone has a hairdo that's as wild as mine is. But yours ain't a bad looking style either, Pitsqueak. Take some pride in that.
This is just the hair I was born with. Not to say I ain't proud of it though! Thanks for the compliment, kid.
No idea who this Cloud person is. Doesn't sound like a Saiyan name to me, but if he's got good hair he sounds okay in my book.
Hmm. Can't say I hate it when people compliment my hair. Sounds like you're trying to get into my good graces, kid. That's pretty smart of ya.
Okay. I'm listening. It's Caulifla by the way, you've gone and gotten that wrong twice now.
Uh huh. Go on...
Yuh huh. By the way, the name's Cauliffla. You keep pronouncing it some other weird way.
Kamikaze, huh? That name probably means something different to me than it does you, but go on...
Sounds fun. Reminds me of how I first started out. Before I came to own half a city and all.
This stuff just comes naturally to Saiyans. It's like ya learn to walk, talk, and then flying is what's next in line.
If ya need some pointers Akko, I might be nice enough to show you some things after this is over. Ain't gonna do it for free though.
It all just kinda comes naturally to me. I guess I am pretty amazing though.
Pft. "So what?" Try swatting me out the sky with that little pole of yours. Then we'll see what's what.
"So what", are you serious? When it starts raining energy blasts, I guess we'll find out how useful flying is.
You say that like you can't fly. Because wow, if that's true, that's kinda pathetic.
Yeah? I can fly. Why's that so big a deal?
Yeah. I get that a lot from you Earth types. Seems that something as simple as flying is too much for humans to wrap their heads around.
Ugh, great. Another human who doesn't know how to fly. I'm guessing ya don't know a whole lot about energy control, Natsuki?
Oh trust me, Pitty Boy, I can keep it up. But seeing as this ain't a fight, I don't see a reason to be using that much power.
Being transformed is more than enough. I'm working on my energy management right now, being all shiny and glowy defeats the purpose of that.
I don't see you wearing sunglasses. Be a pity if I hurt your eyes 'cause I was glowing too much. Last thing I need is to hear you whining about that.
Tch. Well, 'scuse me for not feeling particularly lucky right now.
Given you're about to get a good eyeful right now, kinda feels like you're hoarding that share of luck to yourself.
Yeah, well lucky you, Angel Boy! You're about to see my boobies. I bet you're feeling pretty lucky about that fact.
Oho-ho, I ain't giving up. Not by a long shot. I'm used to being backed into a corner, Pitsqueak!
I'm the last person who needs a pep-talk, Pitty Boy. And I'll be damned if I ain't gonna give this stupid game my all.
Give up? Psh, nah, never. Win or lose, I'm gonna see this thing through to the end.
No idea what a Sour-Gummy is or whatever. I'm a Saiyan, know the difference.
Eh, you're kinda there. I'm a Saiyan, lady. And a super-dooper one at that!
Yeah you're right, I ain't human. I'm Saiyan as the day I was born. And I wouldn't have it any differently.
Ooh, I know that look. You're trying to think of opponents for me to fight. Don't threaten me with a good time...
Hey, can you repeat that? Didn't quite catch that bit about...uhh...ah whatever, I'm guessing that they're strong at least.
Sounds like fun. I'm up for fighting whoever you're thinking about. Just not when I'm about to rip my top off.
Okay, so I think I'll take off one, and leave the other one where it is. Haha, nah. Should've seen the looks on your faces!
Well you got one of them, beat me again and you'll get the other... I'm kidding, I'm ditching both of 'em. Don't get all bent outta shape about it, jeez.
I'm not going to be a sore loser and count each one individually. Though I'm sure your reactions would be hilarious.
We counting things like my bands as pairs here? Both of 'em together, huh? Yeah that's fair, we'd all be here forever otherwise.
Y'know I think Goku said something about adding weights to bands like these. Sounds like a solid idea for training.
Oh well, not like I'm gonna need these right now.
Y'know these are actually super-stretchy, real easy to get off. Pretty damn comfortable to.
Like 'em? Made of the same stuff Saiyans make body armor out of. Won't be scratching these up anytime soon.
HaaaaaAAAAAAHHHHH!
HAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!
HUUUUAAAAGGGGHHHH!
YAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAGH!
Get a load...of THIS!
You've done it now! HAAAAAAAAH!
Let's see how you like this!
BANG!
Should've brought a Potara earring along or something. Would've given me something extra to ditch.
Before anyone asks, yeah, I'm losing them both. I ain't gonna throw my toys out the pram just because the game isn't going my way.
Well, even Saiyan boots feel good to get out of after a long day. Ain't all bad at least.
I've had these on all day. Least it feels good to get 'em off.
Feels good to get them off at least, it being a long day and all.
I'd actually be happy to have them off, it it weren't the fact that I'm running out of stuff.
Yeah, yeah. Both of 'em together. I'll play by the rules, seeing as you won that hand fair and square.
Really should've brought an earring or something. Damn little dangly-things aren't really my style.
I ain't gonna throw the baby out with the bath water just 'cause I lost again. Not exactly happy about it though.
For the record, showing off my boobs ain't too bad. It's losing that I'm pissed about.
I should be doing way better than this. One more loss and I'm history...
And I thought Goku handing my ass to me was bad.
*Sigh* I ain't gonna make a hypocrite of myself. Still can't believe I've lost so many times though.
Yeah, yeah, laugh it up. To be honest, I ain't hung up over ya getting an eyeful. It's losing that's embarrassing.
Can't believe you've gotten me to do this.
(I was so damn cocky at the start. Sure makes this worse for me. And much sweeter for them.)
You think because I've lost a thing or two that I'm gonna lose the game as well? Keep dreaming, that ain't happening! I'm planting my feet and winning this!
Trying real damn hard to keep my cool. I'm feeling anything but cool right now.
Y'know how easy it'd be for me to blow up this whole damn place without meaning it? Keep that in mind.
Usually it's funny watching people do this. Being the loser ain't so fun.
If only this was the other way around. Then you'd all be naked, and I'd be laughing.
I honestly don't know what to say. This has gone way worse than I imagined it going.
You've done pretty well. You can think about that whilst I'm busy pounding your skulls in for making me lose so many times.
Better be careful what you say, I'm not feeling particularly... merciful right now, if you catch my meaning.
Of all the stinking, rotten... crap.
Can't say I'm pleased 'bout how this is going. Quite the opposite really.
Y'know, I should be pissed. I mean I am pissed, but a small part of me is impressed with ya.
Losing this many times? Certainly isn't a cool look.
Who invented this stupid game anyway?
Hmm. You're really speaking my language here. Emi, wasn't it? I think we might just have a thing or two to talk about.
Mmm. No idea what any of this stuff is Emi, but you make it sound real tasty.
Well, well, can't say I'd turn my nose up at some genuine home cooking. Maybe you can show off these tricks of yours after the game?
~blank~
You're telling me. Let's hope we can amp the game up from here on out.
Ah, don't worry your pretty little self about it. I'm sure things'll pick up at some point.
Why dontcha throw a hand or two then, Nugi. Give me something to think about.
Necessary? Hell yeah it was necessary! Wouldn't you wanna transform like this if you could do that yourself
Heh. You kiddin' me? Our friend ~player~'s so weak that I bet I could take on... No! Hey! You wait just a minute!
Oh I bet I could take on a million of ~player~ before I... wait... did you just... I don't think I like your insinuation, Nagatoro!
Hmm. Cute. Can't say that's at the top of my list of concerns right now.
Yeah. Can't say I see any point to it either. It's just gonna grow back again, right?
Yeah. Plus there's that rumor going around that it don't ever grow back if ya shave it. Least I heard that's what happens.
Cute?! Cute?! How the hell do you look at this and call it cute?! Surely AWESOME is what springs to mind!
...You're messing with me, right? There ain't no way you can look at this awesome transformation and call it "cute"!
Heh. Don't worry yourself, Ringo. I ain't here to fight, so I ain't gonna keep powered up. Besides, I ain't just showing off, this is also training for me right now.
Aww, come on! You'd do the same if you could do what I can! And I ain't just showin' off, this is me getting a little training in whilst I play!
Haha, hey don't worry yourself. My hair ain't sharp. Though, now I kinda wish that it was. That would be real useful.
You don't have to worry, my hair just looks pointy. Though that'd be pretty useful if it actually was sharp. Would make my head-butts real effective.
Well thanks for the compliment, I guess. Y'know Saiyan hair mostly only comes in black, so it's kinda cool seeing a long, red mane like yours as well.
Heh. Nice save, red-head. Though for real, your hair is pretty nice as well.
And here I thought that humans were naturally bald. Or is it just human women who have nice long locks like yours?
You're damned right, ~name~. Check it out! You're lookin' at a Saiyan! A Super Saiyan!
You're looking at none other than a Super Saiyan, ~name~. And there ain't no human alive that's strong enough to touch this!
Heck yeah it is! Going Super Saiyan is about as cool as cool gets!
You're damn right is! I always feel super cool whenever I go Super Saiyan!
Heh. Higher than a million little ginger girls like you put together, that's for sure.
Think ya need to re-check your scouter, sweetheart. My spit's probably got a higher power level than just nine thousand.
Heh. Well you wouldn't be the first person to geek out over meeting a Saiyan. I'll take all the nonsense coming outta your mouth as a compliment.
You've used that word twice now. What even is a cos...whatever you just called it?
Y'know what else would be fun? You explaining what the hell a cosplay is.
Huh, you know Goku? Wait, are you saying I look like him or something? I don't look anything like him!
What are ya trying to say? That I look kinda like Goku? Do I look like I'm wearing orange freakin' pajamas over here?
Yeah, dream big, kid. Maybe your hair will follow suit.
That, or you could turn into some kinda giant bird. Makes just as much sense to me.
Heh heh. You'd be surprised, Pitsqueak. Gotta be careful though, hair might tangle around those pretty little wings of yours if ya get too powerful.
Yeah, and maybe your cute little wings will turn gold as well as your hair. Actually, I reckon that would look pretty good.
Hahahaa! I like your attitude, Saki! Maybe after we've gone a round or two, and I've shown ya who you're dealing with, maybe we could be friends. What d'ya say?
Ha! Gotta admit, you're the best challenge I've had all day. I'm game for a fight if you are, so long as ya think ya can handle it.
Finally! I've met a human who isn't a total pushover. I like ya Saki, throwing down with you is gonna be a whole heap of fun!
This, Erufuda? This is the magic that is the one and only Super Saiyan! And yeah, I get that kinda reaction a lot.
I'll tell ya what! This is what a Saiyan looks like when they unleash their true power and strength! Really sets us apart from other fighters.
This is my ace in the hole, elf girl! The awesome power of a Super Saiyan, in the flesh!
I've transformed into a Super Saiyan! And judging by your reaction, I take it that you ain't got anything that's on this level.
Now, see, when I focus all the energy I got into this spot in my back, I can transform into a Super Saiyan. Pretty nifty technique, huh?
Heh. Saiyan specialty I'm afraid, Natsuki.
By thinking "Hey, I bet she'll freak if I use this trick right here!". Then I transformed into a Super Saiyan, turned out I was right.
Well, see, I know this guy. And he went and taught me how to pull off this nice little trick right here.
It's my true power unleashed, that's what this is! And let me tell ya, there ain't many fighters that are on my level.
Yankee? I ain't no Yankee whatever that is, I'm a Saiyan! And us Saiyans got this little trick called transformation. Pretty cool, huh?
(Why the hell's she trying to pick a fight with me? Can't that idiot sense energy? She's gotta realize that I can flatten her in the blink of an eye.)
Yeah, it is. And if that's enough to blow your mind, it's gonna be pretty funny watching ya react to the other stuff that I can do.
Y'know, I'm starting to think that I could make some money teaching humans how to fly. I know a good hustle when I see one.
Well girlie, I honestly don't know what to tell ya. Other than yeah, ya can.
Heh. I'm wondering if there's some real cash to be made here. Teaching humans how to fly and stuff. Y'know, like a school or something.
Yeah and nobody likes a whiner either. Besides, ain't nothing wrong with being competitive.
Hey, being competitive is the best way to get better at something. 'Scuse me for having goals to chase.
Look, I came here to win. Ain't nothing wrong with that, and it'll be fun to see the look on your face when I do.
I'd be having more of a blast if I was doing a little better, personally speaking.
Wish I was doing better, but I can at least dig what you're saying, 'bout doing the best with the deal you're given.
Hmph. You really do remind me of my friend Cabba, Pitty Boy. That sounds like the kinda thing he'd say if we got ourselves into a bind.
Hey, I don't appreciate being called "detestable". Get to know me at least, before trying to get on my bad side.
Don't lump me in with these "Ah Man Ohh" jerks. I bet I'm way cooler than whoever those jerks are.
Hey, I like causin' trouble. But I'm just here to play this game, and laugh at everyone whilst they strip.
Hey, settle down, okay? Don't start nothin', and I won't end nothin', kapish??
Oh yeah! I got a god quaking in their metaphorical boots! The wicked power of a Super Saiyan tends to do that.
Hahaha! And this ain't even me going all out, god-lady!
By the look on your face god-girl, I'm guessing that I've just blown straight past the limit of what you can handle!
Well, I wouldn't mind throwing down with ya sometime. I'll give ya that much, Miko.
If you're ever looking for a sparring partner, there ain't no one better to ask than me. Imagine how much stronger you'd get by throwing down with me!
Well then, "Prince of all Humans". If ever you wanna throw down and test your strength against mine, I'm more than willing to do that.
You said it! But if you're psychic, maybe you could cheat and try to attack my brain or somethin' like that? But I bet that won't work. No one controls me!
Unless you're the kind of "psychic" that controls people's minds, you wouldn't stand a chance against me! Though I bet even that wouldn't work, I'm too stubborn to be controlled!
Hehe...is it hot in here, or is it just me?
Is the heat getting to anyone? It probably ain't the heat though, haha.
Well, things are getting hotter thanks to me at least. Oh, what's that? "You're welcome, Caulifla?" yeah, better be saying something along those lines.
Boobs out, for the whole wide world to see. Starting to realise just how much you humans love these things.
Hmph. All eyes on me. These bastards are about one smart comment away from being a smoking pile of ash.
You bastards watching us got something to say?! Huh?! I'll beat every one of ya to a pulp if you perverts try anything!
And now they can see my everything, in addition to my boobs. Got some real lucky sons of bitches in this crowd here.
SHUT IT! If I here one more fucking "wolf whistle", or "cat call", or whatever the hell any of those things are, I'm blasting this whole place off the face of the Earth!
Had to come to this. Had to come to me showing by butt off in front of all these horny freaks.
Getting an eyeful? Yeah, I bet you are. Get a good look while ya can!
Try to grab a feel and I'll drop ya like a bad habit.
Yeah, yeah. I'm a real heart-throb! For your sake I hope hearts are the only thing that's throbbing right now.
Whatever thoughts are going through your pervy-ass minds right now, keep them to yourselves. Creeps.
Just keep your traps shut. You've given me enough reason to blast ya halfway to hell as is.
Think I'm tapped out? Oh-ho, don't you worry, I have tons of tricks still to spare.
Don't get too excited. I only get better as time wears on.
Shame. They really brought out the color of my eyes.
So, ya got me to ditch my arm bands. Bet you're feeling reeeal proud of yourselves right now.
Eh, you take a hit, you smack 'em back twice as hard.
Nothing more than a warm-up round. Let's keep going.
Alright, whatever. Let's get this thing going again already.
So was that skill on your part, or just a lucky hit? Guess we're gonna find out.
Think I'm scared? Yeah, scared of my awesome and amazing potential perhaps!
Plenty more where that came from. I ain't worried in the slightest!
Hold tight, 'cause I've got another one.
If you thought picking a fight with me was a bad idea before, you've got nothing on what I am now!
Check it out. You scared? I bet you're scared.
Haaah. Always feels great to go Super Saiyan.
Just thought I'd go Super Saiyan. Its actually kinda tricky to keep it on for long periods, so, consider this as me getting some training in whilst we play.
And here we have it, the famous Super Saiyan! If you're scared, I can't say I blame ya.
And now I'm...wait, did I just lose my...nah, I can't say I care, I look damned awesome and I know it!
I don't care how smart you think you are, you've got no chance against me at this level. Bring it on!
Gotta say, it's one hell of a privilege to be born a Saiyan!
Alright! Going Super Saiyan really focuses my battle instincts. Reckon it'll sharpen up my card-playing too!
Alright, no more goofing off. This is where I get serious!
Whatever. You actually think you're gonna beat me? Ha! You ain't got what it takes.
There, you got my boots. Better get used to the idea of this being the last round I'm gonna lose.
Ugh, damn. Alright then, you think you're so tough? Time I showed ya what I'm really made of. Bring it!
You know I'm gonna get all you bastards in the end.
You must think you're pretty tough, huh? Getting my boots off me? Whatever, you've not a chance in hell of beating me.
All right. That's it. That's the last thing you're gonna see me lose. Sad I know, but its just the way these things go.
You think I'm gonna panic, just because I've lost a thing or two? Hell no! This is when a Saiyan is at their best.
Well, to hell with ya all the same, I guess.
Anyone tries to grab a feel? You'll be kissing the cold, hard ground in the blink of the eye, I promise ya.
Just deal the damn cards. It's cold as tits here! And I bet that's on purpose and all!
Ugh. At this point, I barely even give a crap anymore.
Keep your traps shut. You've given me enough reason to blast ya halfway to hell as is.
Think I'm tapped out? Oh-ho, don't you worry, I have tons of tricks still to spare.
Yeah, whatever.
Dammit, I know the situation I'm in, shut up already!
Bet you think you're real tough. Bet I'd kick your ass in a heart-beat; I don't even care if I'm naked!
Y'know, I actually used to be bald down there? Funny story behind that. But whatever, I still got asses to kick here.
Funny story. Friend of mine was asking about styles. Went a bit wrong and I was actually completely bald for a while. If you're into that, keep it to yourself.
Yes, I know what happens if I lose again! Don't damn well remind me!
Crap, if I lose again...I can't let that happen.
Well this is it. Plant my feet and tough it out. That's my only option now.
I'm gonna defeat you. Ya hear me? I'm gonna beat each and every one of ya!
What? What!? What's so interesting? Did you take me for the type who styles herself down there?! 'Cause not!
It tells ya just how many brain cells my dumb-ass crew has to rub between themselves, doesn't it? That I've never found myself here until today.
Well...here she is at last. A strong, Sadalan Saiyan, in all her naked glory! Don't see that every day.
Sh-shut up! I'm a god damn punk, course I don't shave myself! (Ain't gonna tell them the time I was showing Kale some styling tips.)
Alright then, let's see what you've got, ~player~.
Hmm. You look like someone who needs to blow off some steam. Ain't no use trying to play coy with me, ~player~. It's written all over your face.
I ain't sensing a whole lotta energy coming from you, pal. Maybe you're hiding your real ability though, hmm?
Psh. You don't seem all that tough, ~player~. (My instinct are tellin' me otherwise.)
I know when I've got a decent fight on my hands. You ain't gonna quit without a fight.
(Whoever this guy is, he's taking this real seriously. Ain't gonna take him down without a fight.)
Hehe, y'know it's funny. If you'd asked me earlier, I would've guessed that Palutena here was the angel, not you.
Are you really sure that you're the angel here, Pit? It ain't Palutena? She's almost exactly like the angels where I'm from. You... not so much.
Huh. Here I'm just surprised to see a human with a full head of hair. Thought you were all a bunch of walking cue balls or something.
Man, that head of hair wouldn't be outta place on a Saiyan. I thought humans were bald. How about that.
Huh. You have hair. Some humans beings have hair apparently. Learn something new every day.
Hmm. You remind me a little of someone. You wouldn't happen to be Goku's half-human brother of something would ya?
You...kinda remind me of Goku a little. Or his son maybe. In looks at least.
Well hello there, big, tall and mysterious. Got any surprises in store for little old me?
You've been pretty quiet since ya got here. I ain't complaining about it, just stating a fact.
Hmm. You kinda remind me of someone. Ain't gonna tell ya who though.
Hey, I know a guy who's kinda like you. Got the same sorta vibe and energy as he does.
~blank~
(This is where we find out if my hunch was right or not.)
(Come on, buddy. Pull that trick again. Let's see if I'm right about you.)
Oh, don't mind me, Skippy. I'm just waiting for something over here. None of ya business as to what that is.
(If I'm right about this, I'm only gonna need to see it one more time to know.)
Think you could skip to the best bit already?
Wait, if you're using time-skip for this. What does that make what'cha doing right now, a skip-tease?
So, you gonna time-skip again, or ya gonna mix things up this round?
Well go ahead, Skippy. Show us what ya got.
Come on then, Skippy. we doing this one more time then?
On with the skip-tease then? Haha.
Come on then, human Hit. Think you can do your time-skip again for me? Pretty please?
Cute wings. Kinda redundant though, wouldn't you agree? Anyone with half a brain can learn how to fly.
You remind me of the battle royal I was involved in. Talking about the flyers specifically. I don't remember them being all that strong, but they were annoying to deal with.
You just remind me a little of someone I know. (Heh, playing with a regular old Cabba over here.)
You certainly ain't like any angel I've met, that's for sure. Usually they're blue and tall. Then here you are, all pink and short and what have you.
Hey, the angel of the Tenth Universe looked cute and little like you now that I think about. Don't know her name, but she was definitely one of the prettiest angels I've seen.
Hmm. Y'know I've only seen a handful of angels in my time. Maybe they ain't all got blue faces and white hair like Vados and her bros and sisters.
You seem kinda plain-looking if ya ask me. But whatever, let's see what you've got.
Yeah well if looks were power levels, yours both go together pretty good.
Psh. Yeah, sure. Hope your body is more exciting to look at than ya face is.
I'm not ashamed to admit that you've caught my attention. But have ya got the stuff to keep my attention? That's the question.
Hey, I like your attitude! Gonna enjoy seeing you strip just as much.
Hmm. Say, do guys like you normally come to joints like this? I might start coming here more often.
Hmm... Gotta say, you're pretty interesting, ~target~. And I like interesting.
Say, do you have a girlfriend or something, ~target~? 'Cause if so, I wanna make them jealous.
You're what they call a man's man, ain't ya, ~target~? Ha haa! Yeah, you know it!
You okay over there, ~target~? Hey, come on, chin up! I wanna see you enjoying yourself before this is over.
Yo, ~target~? I might pout if you act all boring like, but I'm not gonna make fun of ya. You've got nothing to be shy about and I wanna see you have a good time.
Don't feel down on yourself, ~target~. I think you've got more to offer than ya think. I'm looking forward to playin' with ya!
Hey, are you actin' quiet 'cause you're embarassed about losin', or 'cause you're embarassed about showing whatcha got? You don't have to feel that way if it's the second option.
